docs.text: NEWEST UPDATES We've been updated! 2/9/26: newlines fixed, broken links fixed, images fixed, etc. Some links remain broken... but that's okay, isn't it? God is dead. We killed him. The Earth is inhabited by mutated trees, insects, and disease-ridden fish. From greed came war, and from war came disease. Plants and Animals began to mutate into grotesque creatures, which would die from their own overgrowth. Plants would develop their own sentience, teeth and organs. The disease would eat the very cells in the human body. The only things left were the insects which crawled the Earth. And from the ashes, they grew into a thriving species of vaguely humanoid figures. They’d built a society over time, shockingly similar to the human races. From artifacts, they deciphered languages. From abandoned buildings came flourishing cities. Art was re-learned, computers were re-invented, and wars were re-fought. In 1981, Beau would come into rule, bringing with him a new innovative age of technology, automation, and a capitalistic hell. Historians call it the Beginning of the End. The Beau line would slowly devolve into capitalistic tyranny, all the way until 2012, when God Himself fell from the heavens. The rapture had begun. Angels crashed and burned, volcanoes erupted and the Earth trembled in it’s wake, bringing with it a cold and bitter wind. Historians estimate that 75% of the world was entirely wiped. As the dust clears, a pulsating, white CORE rest in a small mount of cotton. The PRODIGAL CORE was rumored to be the Core of Life, the Heart of God. It’s the ultimate mothers womb, it has the ability to breathe the breath of life into any creature given to it. There was a small girl inside of it. `Her name was Kei.` The last living ruler of Beau’s ancestral line, Adonis, kept everything under a tight fist. The hierarchical system was worse than ever, with the divide from rich and poor growing ever larger. A young scientist began wandering around the Earth, developing her own small, anarchy-run town. Due to its success and stability, and also the sudden boom of population, she decided to kill Adonis. That scientist, Pyrrhon, and a group of her friends snuck behind the exhausted guards and stabbed Adonis in the back of the neck. This began Pyrrhon’s Golden Rule. She rebuilt society entirely, for a short while. She used her knowledge and empathy to grow and enhance the arts and scientific progression. Diseases died out by the hundreds each year. Incurable defects could now be treated. Nothing was chronic, not under her watch. Everything seemed fine. And then Pyrrhon actually realized what being ruler meant. Everything has since been stuffed under the rug. With each disease cured, came millions of dead bodies. With each city liberated, came another pointless regulation. `Pyrrhon killed her parents and used her money to sneak it under the rug.` `To her partners which had found it unethical, she killed them too.` With that, she began conquering the other small countries around her which established sovereignty upon her beginning. Also, she started living suspiciously long, and looked suspiciously young, for a 200 year old woman. She looked like the thriving 20-something she always had been. With each cured disease came three more unethical experiments. With each treated defect came a new country devoured under her reign, until everything was run by one person. Pyrrhon. From her goal of reversing Beau’s tyranny, she had become even worse. It was also then, that Pyrrhon had made the biggest scientific breakthrough in all of history: the secrets of Immortality and her infamous ‘clone army’. This marked the years until now as “The Age of Eugenics”, because that’s what it was and still is. And everything’s crumbling, all the same. tl;dr Anyway, think of LA and New York. Compress it into a really awful city. Think of the Earth. Take out 75% of it and then replace it with your LA/NY concoction. That is CORE. CORE’s this platformer hack-n-slasher which takes place in an ugly cyberpunk landscape. While in the small corners of the Earth, there remain tribes and temples, most of the world has been overrun by capitalism and war. It’s known as the Age of Eugenics, all run under Pyrrhon : a 200-year-old dictator who looks suspiciously like a 20 year old woman. When she’s not imposing laws or censoring opinions, you’ll find her with a test tube and a nucleus, in hopes of discovering immortality. Pyrrhon is a clone fanatic. She found the perfectly genetic being, or at least what she thought was the perfectly genetic being, and cloned and cloned and cloned until the Earth was overrun with them. The Earth is dying. But who really cares about that, anyway? Because once she destroys and rebuilds Earth in her perfect image , everything’s going to be okay.. More can be found somewhere in Early History What the fuck are you talking about god died humans died world repopulated by stickfigures history repeats itself pyrrhon discovers immortality She clones herself and others "To prevent war i'm going to kill everyone and fill the earth with perfect beings, my clones" profit If you're interested in a more in-depth explanation, uh, I’ll write it eventually. And if you want more about cloning head to Cloning . If youre interested in the very beginning of the story read Prequel . Do note that if you read prequel, most of it is entirely irrelevant to the main story. Except for a few notable parts. However if you’d like to read the story in chronological order, then the prequel is a nice place to start. If not, um, then you can read the individual character descriptions.. Who is Pyrrhon? What's a CORE? Great question. Pyrrhon is CORE's dictator and scientist. Creator of clones. What's a CORE ? It's like your heart. Your soul inside of a machine. You need other people's COREs to survive. Not everyone has a CORE, it's mostly for soldiers. But to survive, they devour and consume other CORE's. What a lame name! Wanna see more? Here's my characters! (The playable ones) ”What’s a shift? What’s an extended ability?” Check out Mechatronix Gamma Nea Honeycakes Constantine Worried about spoilers? Can’t help you there. LORE Prequel Cloning Stickfigures General Worldbuilding Wait, where’s the story?! Sweats. Well, it’s existed, just not in a good draft. Core’s main story is currently on its ninth draft (with more to come!) A good way to read up on the story is probably.. Prequel Theres two ways you can diverge from here. FOR MORE ABOUT TLH, SHENX, AND KHAN.. (optional reading, but useful if youre a particularly large fan of Constantine . Shenx TLH FOR MORE/ ABOUT MARIAN AND THE MAIN STORY.. Nea Then, Constantine (if you havent read about tlh and shenx, now is the time to do that.) Gamma Honeycakes SCRAPKILL (Honeycakes centric) Now what? If that bores you, then you can click on a random character and pray it has a finished description. Like Coda or 07 ANGEL . docs.text: Anyway, think of LA and New York. Compress it into a really awful city. Think of the Earth. Take out 75% of it and then replace it with your LA/NY concoction. That is CORE. CORE’s this platformer hack-n-slasher which takes place in an ugly cyberpunk landscape. While in the small corners of the Earth, there remain tribes and temples, most of the world has been overrun by capitalism and war. It’s known as the Age of Eugenics, all run under Pyrrhon : a 200-year-old dictator who looks suspiciously like a 20 year old woman. When she’s not imposing laws or censoring opinions, you’ll find her with a test tube and a nucleus, in hopes of discovering immortality. Pyrrhon is a clone fanatic. She found the perfectly genetic being, or at least what she thought was the perfectly genetic being, and cloned and cloned and cloned until the Earth was overrun with them. The Earth is dying. But who really cares about that, anyway? Because once she destroys and rebuilds Earth in her perfect image , everything’s going to be okay.. More can be found somewhere in Early History

docs.text: Hey there! Welcome to my Wiki. As you can see, most of it remains unfinished. I’ll format this all.. eventually, but for now, please enjoy my garden of dead links and unbudded flowers. Also— not all of the pages are here since I forget to add them and there’s way too many to keep track of. I am doing my best though! docs.text: MUTILATION Requires reading of: Mutilation (Laying down) “ahah. Hello, Herod. I’m sorry to keep you in so long. Take a seat, Omega .” (M) “…” (takes a seat) (O) “No boys like me. You know why?” (M) “Y-you’re a.. you’re that .. that thing!”(O) “Thing? How rude.” (M) “Th.. then your mouth, is..?”(O) (Rips off mouth to reveal it was sheet piece of LED and a radio) “that’s Herod. He’s my real body.” “…”(O) “Yes, yes.. well, you seem unaffected. That’s why I always go for soldiers. They’ve seen much, much worse.” (M) “… your eye,”(O) “Yes? You like it, don’t you? I’d give it to you, but.. well, yours are rarer. So be happy I dont take those~” (M) (.. Chou…) (O) “The last man I met was Khan ... didn’t care how disfigured I looked. Didn’t matter how much I took out of him. He just wanted me.. Oh, I’ve never felt so flattered since Pyrrhon created me..~” (M) “K- Khan ..?! You mean, that old hag? The one who died, like twenty years ago?!” (O) “Hm? Oh, I…” (lie) “I met him, during his last days..~” (M) (Aware) “.. I see.”(O) “I’ve never found another man so eager. Then you came along. You don’t care what I look like, do you?” (M) “…”(O) (Strokes little hair piece) “… hm~ I like this. You should keep it growing. I hear that it’s quite popular among young troops.” (M) “… (blush).”(O) “Now, shall we begin?” (M) “But, I-…”(O) “Getting cold feet? (Sigh) how silly. But now that you’ve seen me, I might have to kill you.” (M) “Don’t get ahead of yourself.”(O) “Ho, ho? You’re strong. A really strong man..~ why don’t you come here? I’ll show you a really good night.” (M) Sidequest “.. you haven’t aged a day.”(H) “Ah? Hmm.. I see you’ve heeded my advice” (strokes Honey’s hair). “You look so beautiful like that. (Begins to feel around Honeycakes ) and.. what’s this?” “…”(H) “A sex change? Well, not to worry. I don’t care. Science can do many things, including me. Hahahah.” “I brought what you wanted.”(H) “Hm?” “ Marian ’s daughter. The lover of… your lover.”(H) “wh-what?!”(G) “Wheel her in.” (H) “That-.. wasn’t part of our plan!” (G) “That’s right. It’s part of mine.”(H) “You.. you traitor!” (G) “Don’t forget your place. You work under me.”(H) “… (fidgeting)”(G) “And your eye?”(H) “Hm? Oh, yes…” (flicks up hair) “it’s gorgeous, isn’t it? It’s fresh, too. Shame I have to give it away.” “I don’t want that one. I want the other one.” “Uh? The one from that little girl?” “ Chou .” “Ah, yes.. I remember. Your mother..~ a real cute one, she was. I loved her, so much..~ she barely lasted. Barely lasted..” “Here.” (Tosses sandwich) “they’re mantises.” “Ah!~ you remembered? Awww, Herod says he loves you~” (Incomprehensible noises from Herod) “…” before that Honeycakes : I saved both of your pathetic lives. You’re coming with me. Gamma : it’s … it’s 3 in the morning..? Honeycakes : I’m here to beat morning traffic, not listen to you complain. Get moving. Nea , you come too. Gamma : she’s passed out. She won’t wake up. Honeycakes : is that so? Well, load her up. Make sure she doesn’t run, so tie her up. Gamma : wh-what if she wakes up..?! Honeycakes : she’ll be fine. I won’t let anything happen to her. Gamma : .. Honeycakes : You want to be a real clone soldier? Then listen to me. I’m your superior. Let’s get moving. Gamma : tch. Gamma : where are we going, anyway? Honeycakes : visiting an old friend of mine. She has something I want. (Honey drugged Nea so she wouldn’t wake up) SO Honey’s goal: get Chou ’s eye Why? It has Chou ’s DNA— her DNA. Why? She just wants to have it. Now, Mutilation is extremely strong and quite literally revives herself. She’s rich and lives deep, deep in the mountain. She has guards and everything. Gamma : how did you even meet her..!? Honeycakes : Like me, she’s a high up. You’re a soldier, act like it. Gamma : Y-.. yes ma’am! Honey’s a bit suicidal which is why she made this plan up in the first place. But she’s tired of Mutiliation’s very existence, so she brings in Nea . She discovered that Nea has a directly opposite blood type to Mutilation , AND Marian ’s CORE. Since Marian ’s CORE is covered with Nea ’s blood and is a newer CORE update, she will explode internally. So when it comes in contact with Marian ’s CORE, it will attempt to auto-update to absorb the CORE. However, since her CORE is a custom job, the CORE realizes that a lot of checksums are missing and then realizes that something is wrong. Since it realizes that it has been tampered with, it will corrode instantly, killing Mutilation instantly, since it will kill her before she’s able to revive herself. The plan generally goes as planned, but when Herod goes to eat Nea , Gamma snaps and attacks Mutilation. They obviously can’t fight Mutilation because they’re both outnumbered and Mutilation can very much kill the two of them. They get attacked but Honey manually restrains Gamma and tells Herod to eat Nea . It’s really intense. Nea is about to fucking die Herod sinks its teeth into Nea ’s shoulder, as Honey instructs. That is where Honeycakes planted a bit of Nea ’s core, so Herod recoils and begins to melt and corrode. However she put too little and Mutilation catches onto the plan and attacks them. .. only she doesn’t. Mutilation pins down Nea as she groggily begins to wake up and gets really freaky. “I know ou. I know you! I KNOW YOU!!! I KNOW YUOU!!! Mother , youre my father my father my father MY FAHTER!! YOURE MY FAHTER.. “ She thinks that Marian is her father, and since it’s Marian ’s CORE.. Marian isn’t her father, she was just Pyrrhon’s ‘’lover’’ Anyway the vicinity between Mutilation and Marian ’s CORE kinda fucks things up and Nea goes into a deep, deep digital flashback. so does Mutilation It lasts a second for Gamma and Honeycakes . But in there, Nea basically is attacked by Marian ( mutilation ). She stabs him, and Mutilation says, “you’ve done so well..” She gets flashbacks to when Marian offered her his CORE. The sensation is so intense that it disrupts the connection and backfires on Mutilation , killing her instnatly. Nea wakes up seeing Honey hanging up Mutilation like a slab of meat and sifting through the organs she wants to keep. She has Han cool them for her in a portable cooler. Gamma is mostly making sure Nea is okay Honeycakes : … Alright. That’s about 10k Danari. Gamma : wh-.. WHAT??? NO ONE IS WORTH THAT MUCH!!! Honeycakes : look at these organs. They’re branded. Don’t you see the variety? You scan them yourself. They’re soldiers— good soldiers. And these are in good shape. Gamma : you know, if you wanted to sell organs, you could’ve just became a Merc! Honeycakes : hah. No, it was just this one time. I just wanted to get one, but.. 10k Danari is a nice farewell gift from her.❤️ She plucks out Chou ’s eye and places it into a jar. Honeycakes : there we are. Gamma : the hell is that? Honeycakes : It’s your mother’s eye. It’s Chou ’s eye. Gamma : …! Honeycakes : obviously Chou is dead. I don’t intend on reviving her. Think of these as, “her ashes”. Gamma : wh-.. what did you plan to do with them? Honeycakes : look at it. Gamma : …? Honeycakes : did you think I was going to clone her? I have a business to run. I just wanted to look at her. Gamma : that’s why you risked Nea ’S LIFE??! Honeycakes : well, look. She’s alive, isn’t she? And she killed Mutilation . Honeycakes : don’t worry. You both can keep 10 thousand D each. I already counted our shares. Han! Load up the cart, we’re going to Ritas! The Honeycakes Romance Quest I had an idea So, Honeycakes is going out shopping for vegetables. She meets this little farmer girl, named Cherry. Cherry: my name is Cherry, like the food. Honeycakes : huh! Well, my name is Honey, like the candy! (Giggle snicker) They start to get along really well. Trading free food together.. cooking each other meals. One day, Honeycakes is invited to Cherry’s farm for dinner. Honey brought over her steamed fish. Cherry: Honey! Can you pass me the knife? Honeycakes : Sure thing ❤️ (She passes the knife. She holds it with a throwing grip, but she doesnt throw it.) (Dad glances at her wearily) Dad: … you two dating? (Cherry groans) Honeycakes : actually, no! Honey is my name! Dad: … Honeycakes : My full name is Honeycakes . First name honey, last name cakes. Dad: so.. mister cakes— Honeycakes : ms. I’m a woman. (Dad glances at Honey’s chest) Dad: .. are you sure? Cherry: dad!!! Don’t do that!! (Dad leans back in his chair): you know, back in my day, Pyrrhon’s empire didn’t allow this sort of thing! Men were soldiers, and— Honeycakes : actually, a large majority of soldiers were transgender or gay! Pyrrhon didn’t have any official laws against gay marriages, it was just because the church was so widespread 40 years ago, that it basically was a law. Cherry: huh? How old are you? Honeycakes : sixty (THIS IS A JOKE ITS UNOFFICIAL) ( Dinh comes up from behind, unaware that Honeycakes is ACTUALY Omega) Dinh : yeah? You look really good for a sixty year old. Honeycakes : tee hee ❤️ (hasn’t turned around) I’m flattered~ Dinh : and you sure know an awful lot about the war back then, for a fisherman, at least. Honeycakes , turning around: well, I.. (She sees Dinh and freezes) (Her eyes drift naturally towards her chest) Dinh : my eyes are up here. Honeycakes : a-ack, sorry. Dinh : Right. Well, I suppose you’ve caused enough of a commotion in this household. Honeycakes : r-right. I need to work! Se-see you later, Cherry! Cherry: huh? Aww.. (Silence as Honey leaves) Cherry: Dad!! You’re so annoying!! You wanna talk about war laws? Honey lived through them. You read about them on conspiracy forums!! Dinh : Yeah? Cherry: Yeah! (Cherry doesn’t really know about Honey’s past) Dinh : where did you say she worked again? Cherry: umm.. (hands her a business card). ( Dinh raises an eyebrow) Soldiers have a special punctuation quirk to identify themselves as soldiers amongst other soldiers. It’s mostly used for passing secret notes around. The notes are typically encrypted. Since everything a soldier writes must be with this particular quirk, (it looks like a random comma to the naked eye, but to the educated..) she’s just never grown out of it. ( Dinh realizes that it’s Honeycakes handwriting) Dinh :.. and where can I find this.. Iron Lantern (the name of the restaurant)? Cherry: h-huh? But I thought you didn’t like Ha-Binh’s food.. Dinh : hmph. ( Dinh just runs out, chasing after Honeycakes ) —- Cherry falls in love with Honeycakes , unaware of Honey’s past. Honey just assumes that Cherry is being nice to her. Once Cherry confesses, Honey almost has a breakdown and pretty violently tells Cherry that she knows nothing about who Honey is, and what she’s done. Cherry tries telling her that that’s okay, and she’s willing to forgive her. She jokingly throws in, “it’s not like you’re a national guardian or anything. Coz then my dad wouldda killed you! And Dinh probably would really like you more.” … Anyway. as Honey finally relents and allows Cherry to lean in for a kiss, Cherry is stabbed. she slumps into Honey’s chest. Dinh stabbed Cherry, thinking it was Honey. It was dark.. easy mistake. Honey goes a little bit apeshit and almost kills her. Cecelia and Diana two twin girls, one pink and one purple. They follow around Myazaki to an obsessive extent. They’re like Mya’s little sisters, and take everything Mya says as law. Will defend Mya til the day they die. Diana is optimistic and trigger happy. Despite being a nurse, she carries a pistol with her at all times. She smiles in even the strangest situations, and finds herself giggling at almost everything. She likes to joke around with her patients and say, “uh oh! This parts infected! We’ll cut it out~ Diana, please give me the chainsaw!” Cecelia is the more level-headed one. The compassionate, though quieter girl of the twins. She still remains optimistic but is a lot gentler with what she does. She caries around a sniper rifle with her, also despite being a nurse. She’s incredibly obsessive over Mya even to the point of deterring Diana from approaching Mya too much. Cecelia frankly doesn’t care, and is just happy to have something to do. Myazaki a brute-force sort of girl. Similarly to Honeycakes , she was a war veteran, but turned into a nurse. Or, she’s trying to. She’s very strict and stern, like an old traditional woman. She has a harsh glare and generally scares everyone away when she approaches them. Looks like an absolute punk. Incredibly muscular, but does her best to be gentle. However, she usually ends up destroying it anyway. Mya was initially weary of Cecelia and Diana, but since they were both nurses, she decided to keep them around to hopefully ease everyone’s worries about her. Rumors only spread about Mya, and she’s.. incredibly depressed about them. I had an idea where Myazaki left for a single afternoon to go get food in another city. Cecelia and Diana are freaking the FUCK out when they catch Honeycakes in the distance beating the shit out of some clankers (sorry). And theyre like “HOLY SHIT !!! SHES PERFECT!!” And start to swarm Honeycakes and ask if they could acompany her. I jsut thought it would be really funny to have Honeycakes of ALL PEOPLE be off put by something . Insert quest content here. e if they saw Mya and were like “OH MY GOD MYA WE THOUGHT YOU DIED” and latch off of Honeycakes and back onto Mya sobbing and crying. And Mya is exasperated and like “… I just got take out.” And Cecelia and Diana just leave Honeycakes forever alone, but you can at least get a discount whenver you travel to their area in game. Swamp King III The tl;dr for this side quest goes as follows: Honeycakes and Constantine are paddle boarding and hunting for fish Honeycakes : haha, if you're not careful, the merfolk will kidnap you! Constantine : wh-what? Honeycakes : They live in pools like this.. and they'll EAT YOU!!! (cackle) Constantine : i'm 23, Honey. Honeycakes : keh. you're no fun. Can you hand me that--? ... const is gone ..... Honey scans the water. all mineral oil? no wonder there was no fish! But where are they?.. Honey jumps in to find Constantine : and finds a full underwater society. She also finds Nea trying to fix her hair. Like they're both swept into a whirlpool and "what the hell are you doing here??", soaked and dripping in a humid sewer system. I imagine it like . the mermaid society in the mlp movie LOL. Nea is swept in completely separately. Like she has no idea why honey is there. “Bleghhhghghh— Nea ???” “I can't work under these conditions. WAIT WHAT THE FUCK” Anyway they go around to go find Constantine :. Turns out, because of his mask they thought he was a cyborg and they were gonna scrap him for parts. Gamma and Nea were actually on a cleaning job together, and Gamma looked away for a bit, and Nea fell into a whirlpool. So Gamma is probably super pissed. Anyway the society is kind of like.. weird. Weird criminals who live under the plates of the ground, but not a part of the real underground society. More black-market-y than the normal black market. Sorta like dogtown from cyberpunk. Anyway I dunno what happens in the middle, but eventually after a huge fight, it ends with a gunshot coming from the corner… Gamma /!!??!? she runs at Nea with a knife and is like “I HAD TO CLEAN THAT WHOLE POOL BY MYSLEF!!!!” And she was so angry she even worked with the local police to go find Nea . But they ended up taking down a huge crime ring that lived in the sewers. Not associated with the normal swamp king side quest. General single int Loveless’s wife quest This weird kid keeps bothering everyone and complains that there’s an alien abduction happening. If you go to the area at that time, there actualy IS an alien abduction and you have to kill every single one of them NPC friend says "someone wanted this ring, but I cant deliver it myself. Can you?" And then when you turn around it gets stolen so you need to make a new one Alternatively you could track down the robber. It's just the NPC who says "I changed my mind". After you stab him, he just dusts himself off and walks away So when youre tracking down Vee (the villain for the intro), a suspicious mafia boss says he'll give you information if you pay him 1 USD. You give him one USD and he says "Kay, next, you need to steal the cash register from the local department store and then I'll give it to you." And so you do that and you find him shot dead so you just take the cash register and get a lot of money. He has a treasure chest in his hands which may or may not be real (its not) A band leader named Billiam Smakespar lost his most important possession- his cyborg singer! "Okay so I was out partying and I lost her power source, can you find it?I'll mark the area on your map for you!" A restaurant wants you to kill all of the people leaving bad reviews on their store A local department store wants you to play security and kick out any bad customers for a higher rating. The 'bad customers' in question are people who have comically large weaponry. There is an exception. He is a penguin. " i was going to bring this pack of fish to my daughter. but you stabbed me. who will feed my daughter now? " The sewers have mutant rats which run around the city. They’re mean to deal with so if you just go to the sewers and kill the queen, they stop attacking you. You also get the rats head as a medal I had a side quest for Gamma since she does mercenary work wgeee one of her weird ex's hired her, initially to kill some ppl, but it turned out he just wanted to have a final date with her have to go through a gambling hall (casino like thing) pipeline….u play card games to gain info on smth Crashing a large party with Shenx and Constantine : to obtain information Go on a date with Huangzhi You need to find two twins: one of them is named This One, and the other one is named That One. They’d have extremely vital information and Shenx needs it. This One: together, we are… That one: those guys! Gamma sees weird al and says, Gamma : woah! Weird al! Weird Al: that’s me! I need you to do something for me. Gamma : anything for you (Side quest given) have to go through a gambling hall (casino like thing) pipeline….u play card games to gain info on smth Crashing a large party with Shenx and Constantine : to obtain information
docs.title: SideQuests

docs.text: Requires reading of: Mutilation (Laying down) “ahah. Hello, Herod. I’m sorry to keep you in so long. Take a seat, Omega .” (M) “…” (takes a seat) (O) “No boys like me. You know why?” (M) “Y-you’re a.. you’re that .. that thing!”(O) “Thing? How rude.” (M) “Th.. then your mouth, is..?”(O) (Rips off mouth to reveal it was sheet piece of LED and a radio) “that’s Herod. He’s my real body.” “…”(O) “Yes, yes.. well, you seem unaffected. That’s why I always go for soldiers. They’ve seen much, much worse.” (M) “… your eye,”(O) “Yes? You like it, don’t you? I’d give it to you, but.. well, yours are rarer. So be happy I dont take those~” (M) (.. Chou…) (O) “The last man I met was Khan ... didn’t care how disfigured I looked. Didn’t matter how much I took out of him. He just wanted me.. Oh, I’ve never felt so flattered since Pyrrhon created me..~” (M) “K- Khan ..?! You mean, that old hag? The one who died, like twenty years ago?!” (O) “Hm? Oh, I…” (lie) “I met him, during his last days..~” (M) (Aware) “.. I see.”(O) “I’ve never found another man so eager. Then you came along. You don’t care what I look like, do you?” (M) “…”(O) (Strokes little hair piece) “… hm~ I like this. You should keep it growing. I hear that it’s quite popular among young troops.” (M) “… (blush).”(O) “Now, shall we begin?” (M) “But, I-…”(O) “Getting cold feet? (Sigh) how silly. But now that you’ve seen me, I might have to kill you.” (M) “Don’t get ahead of yourself.”(O) “Ho, ho? You’re strong. A really strong man..~ why don’t you come here? I’ll show you a really good night.” (M) Sidequest “.. you haven’t aged a day.”(H) “Ah? Hmm.. I see you’ve heeded my advice” (strokes Honey’s hair). “You look so beautiful like that. (Begins to feel around Honeycakes ) and.. what’s this?” “…”(H) “A sex change? Well, not to worry. I don’t care. Science can do many things, including me. Hahahah.” “I brought what you wanted.”(H) “Hm?” “ Marian ’s daughter. The lover of… your lover.”(H) “wh-what?!”(G) “Wheel her in.” (H) “That-.. wasn’t part of our plan!” (G) “That’s right. It’s part of mine.”(H) “You.. you traitor!” (G) “Don’t forget your place. You work under me.”(H) “… (fidgeting)”(G) “And your eye?”(H) “Hm? Oh, yes…” (flicks up hair) “it’s gorgeous, isn’t it? It’s fresh, too. Shame I have to give it away.” “I don’t want that one. I want the other one.” “Uh? The one from that little girl?” “ Chou .” “Ah, yes.. I remember. Your mother..~ a real cute one, she was. I loved her, so much..~ she barely lasted. Barely lasted..” “Here.” (Tosses sandwich) “they’re mantises.” “Ah!~ you remembered? Awww, Herod says he loves you~” (Incomprehensible noises from Herod) “…” before that Honeycakes : I saved both of your pathetic lives. You’re coming with me. Gamma : it’s … it’s 3 in the morning..? Honeycakes : I’m here to beat morning traffic, not listen to you complain. Get moving. Nea , you come too. Gamma : she’s passed out. She won’t wake up. Honeycakes : is that so? Well, load her up. Make sure she doesn’t run, so tie her up. Gamma : wh-what if she wakes up..?! Honeycakes : she’ll be fine. I won’t let anything happen to her. Gamma : .. Honeycakes : You want to be a real clone soldier? Then listen to me. I’m your superior. Let’s get moving. Gamma : tch. Gamma : where are we going, anyway? Honeycakes : visiting an old friend of mine. She has something I want. (Honey drugged Nea so she wouldn’t wake up) SO Honey’s goal: get Chou ’s eye Why? It has Chou ’s DNA— her DNA. Why? She just wants to have it. Now, Mutilation is extremely strong and quite literally revives herself. She’s rich and lives deep, deep in the mountain. She has guards and everything. Gamma : how did you even meet her..!? Honeycakes : Like me, she’s a high up. You’re a soldier, act like it. Gamma : Y-.. yes ma’am! Honey’s a bit suicidal which is why she made this plan up in the first place. But she’s tired of Mutiliation’s very existence, so she brings in Nea . She discovered that Nea has a directly opposite blood type to Mutilation , AND Marian ’s CORE. Since Marian ’s CORE is covered with Nea ’s blood and is a newer CORE update, she will explode internally. So when it comes in contact with Marian ’s CORE, it will attempt to auto-update to absorb the CORE. However, since her CORE is a custom job, the CORE realizes that a lot of checksums are missing and then realizes that something is wrong. Since it realizes that it has been tampered with, it will corrode instantly, killing Mutilation instantly, since it will kill her before she’s able to revive herself. The plan generally goes as planned, but when Herod goes to eat Nea , Gamma snaps and attacks Mutilation. They obviously can’t fight Mutilation because they’re both outnumbered and Mutilation can very much kill the two of them. They get attacked but Honey manually restrains Gamma and tells Herod to eat Nea . It’s really intense. Nea is about to fucking die Herod sinks its teeth into Nea ’s shoulder, as Honey instructs. That is where Honeycakes planted a bit of Nea ’s core, so Herod recoils and begins to melt and corrode. However she put too little and Mutilation catches onto the plan and attacks them. .. only she doesn’t. Mutilation pins down Nea as she groggily begins to wake up and gets really freaky. “I know ou. I know you! I KNOW YOU!!! I KNOW YUOU!!! Mother , youre my father my father my father MY FAHTER!! YOURE MY FAHTER.. “ She thinks that Marian is her father, and since it’s Marian ’s CORE.. Marian isn’t her father, she was just Pyrrhon’s ‘’lover’’ Anyway the vicinity between Mutilation and Marian ’s CORE kinda fucks things up and Nea goes into a deep, deep digital flashback. so does Mutilation It lasts a second for Gamma and Honeycakes . But in there, Nea basically is attacked by Marian ( mutilation ). She stabs him, and Mutilation says, “you’ve done so well..” She gets flashbacks to when Marian offered her his CORE. The sensation is so intense that it disrupts the connection and backfires on Mutilation , killing her instnatly. Nea wakes up seeing Honey hanging up Mutilation like a slab of meat and sifting through the organs she wants to keep. She has Han cool them for her in a portable cooler. Gamma is mostly making sure Nea is okay Honeycakes : … Alright. That’s about 10k Danari. Gamma : wh-.. WHAT??? NO ONE IS WORTH THAT MUCH!!! Honeycakes : look at these organs. They’re branded. Don’t you see the variety? You scan them yourself. They’re soldiers— good soldiers. And these are in good shape. Gamma : you know, if you wanted to sell organs, you could’ve just became a Merc! Honeycakes : hah. No, it was just this one time. I just wanted to get one, but.. 10k Danari is a nice farewell gift from her.❤️ She plucks out Chou ’s eye and places it into a jar. Honeycakes : there we are. Gamma : the hell is that? Honeycakes : It’s your mother’s eye. It’s Chou ’s eye. Gamma : …! Honeycakes : obviously Chou is dead. I don’t intend on reviving her. Think of these as, “her ashes”. Gamma : wh-.. what did you plan to do with them? Honeycakes : look at it. Gamma : …? Honeycakes : did you think I was going to clone her? I have a business to run. I just wanted to look at her. Gamma : that’s why you risked Nea ’S LIFE??! Honeycakes : well, look. She’s alive, isn’t she? And she killed Mutilation . Honeycakes : don’t worry. You both can keep 10 thousand D each. I already counted our shares. Han! Load up the cart, we’re going to Ritas!

Can you?" And then when you turn around it gets stolen so you need to make a new one Alternatively you could track down the robber. It's just the NPC who says "I changed my mind". After you stab him, he just dusts himself off and walks away So when youre tracking down Vee (the villain for the intro), a suspicious mafia boss says he'll give you information if you pay him 1 USD. You give him one USD and he says "Kay, next, you need to steal the cash register from the local department store and then I'll give it to you." And so you do that and you find him shot dead so you just take the cash register and get a lot of money. He has a treasure chest in his hands which may or may not be real (its not) A band leader named Billiam Smakespar lost his most important possession- his cyborg singer! "Okay so I was out partying and I lost her power source, can you find it?I'll mark the area on your map for you!" A restaurant wants you to kill all of the people leaving bad reviews on their store A local department store wants you to play security and kick out any bad customers for a higher rating. The 'bad customers' in question are people who have comically large weaponry. There is an exception. He is a penguin. " i was going to bring this pack of fish to my daughter. but you stabbed me. who will feed my daughter now? " The sewers have mutant rats which run around the city. They’re mean to deal with so if you just go to the sewers and kill the queen, they stop attacking you. You also get the rats head as a medal I had a side quest for Gamma since she does mercenary work wgeee one of her weird ex's hired her, initially to kill some ppl, but it turned out he just wanted to have a final date with her have to go through a gambling hall (casino like thing) pipeline….u play card games to gain info on smth Crashing a large party with Shenx and Constantine : to obtain information Go on a date with Huangzhi You need to find two twins: one of them is named This One, and the other one is named That One. They’d have extremely vital information and Shenx needs it. This One: together, we are… That one: those guys! Gamma sees weird al and says, Gamma : woah! Weird al! Weird Al: that’s me! I need you to do something for me. docs.text: These are the mechanics that I am still unsure whether to add or not. # Buffs and Debuffs Buffs Awaken `Base attack + 5% for 5 sec (stackable, but removed when the timer runs out), and regenerate a small amount of health passively.` Enrage `Guaranteed crit for the next 3 hits (stackable)` Regeneration `Regenerate 1% health for five seconds. Stackable up to 5% per second.` Armor `Physical damage taken is reduced by 25%. Unstackable and caps out at five seconds.` Infusion `The next hit is guaranteed to have a magic sting to it. Can be activated by magic characters.` Debuffs Bleed `Lose 1% health per second for 3 seconds. Stackable up to 3%. Every time you dash, you lose an extra 1%.` Stun `Self-explanatory. Stun will last for 1.75 seconds.` Tire `It slows the character down, and you cannot gain anything during its infliction period.` Smog `Accuracy down -75%` Silence `Magical Stun, unable to use magic for a period of time (15% of an attackers MG points)` Special Events Ravenous `x` Ventriloquist `All damage is increased by 1/2, but you dont take it— your teammate does! They will not be really happy about it.` Sugar High `Character has an unlimited amount of MP for a period of time, does not gain AD during this time. They will also receive a -50% remaining HP debuff when it stops.` Church Modes Inside of dungeons, you can choose to get (You can’t choose it forces you to) get a Mode. A church mode in music is like Ionian Dorian Phrygian Lydian Mixolydian etc. It just changes the notes in the scale. EX: Dorian scale flattens the 3rd and 7th note in whatever scale. So Bb Dorian just means the Third and Seventh note in Bb are flat, so: Bb, C, Db , Eb, F, G, Ab , Bb (Dorian) As opposed to: Bb, C, D, Eb, F, G, A, Bb. (Ionian | Base) So, in CORE, each number on the scale is assigned to a stat. 1 - ADCH 2 - ADRES 3 - Attack 4 - MGATK 5 - Defense 6 - MGDEF 7 - CRITRATE/HP 8 - CRITDMG the more debuffs, the better the buff. Ionian 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 Base Stat No buffs or debuffs. Dorian 1 2 3b 4 5 6 7b 8 -- ATK,HP Grants added defense for each hit. ALL defense buffs reset when the combo ends. Hits can be on either party, enemy or player. However , you stay at a constant +1 Armor. Mixolydian 1 2 3 4 5 6 7b 8 -- HP Your HP is cut in half, but your defense is significantly higher. Also, regenerate HP from each critical hit. Lydian 1 2b 3b 4 5 6b 7b 8 -- ATK,MGDEF, HP You stay at a consistent +1 armor, AND get an added stamina boost. Lydian 1 2 3 4 # 5 6 7 8 +MGATK `*Boosts the power of all of your magic attacks, but they consume more stamina.*` Aeolian 1 2 3b 4 5 6b 7b 8 -ATK,-MGDEF,-HP Locrian 1 2b 3 4 5b 6 7 8 --ADRES,DEF *Damage inflicted on you is suffered by the enemy by 10-50% (buffed to 75% when in Awaken), but you take more damage.*

docs.text: using a state machine. The player obj will just be one thing. Gamma, Nea, Honey, and Constantine will all be states, and the shift will be another state vG= variable gamma just so we are clear this is an ariable Player obj is ALWAYS in state G, N, H or C. By default: { Default set var vG = true } Ex: if key_1 pressed, state = G{ If state = G{ Set var vG = true # this is for dialogue purposes and determining who is first in party } # Code for her stats ie var spd = 10; # etc } If key_2 pressed, state = N{ set var vN = true; # stats here } Make sure all variables start with ‘v(char symbol)’ to differentiate it from the state. (Ie if G = true…) Also if state inair{ # code to preform the air attacks } If state dash { # dash attack code } Another state. SHIFT. Var for shift is s(char) IF key tab pressed, enter shift{ enter shift mode here If state = sG, { # check character # if player = Gamma then code for Gamma’s state here Gun mechanic goes here } if state = sN{ # if player = Nea then Code of Nea’s shift state } } Etc etc.

docs.text: Remember how Gamma crash-landed from the sky? She came from FUTURE, an artificial planet built off of a nearby asteroid. It orbits Earth. Most of the building process is confidential. - To prevent further environmental damage, Pyrrhon and her crew built Future, and now they make clones and run nuclear experiments on other nearby planets and stars. This is the head department of science. - Contrary to popular belief, the [Intergalactic Railroad](../Worldbuilding/Intergalactic Railroad.md) doesn’t go here. - .. why would you think it would..? - Once an asteroid, now a full sized artificial planet. It fused with the moon to be around the same size. - Just the ultimate lab. It’s in space so no clones can escape and nobody can get up there without explicit permission. - You will just die if you stowaway. - It’s a permanent residency. Actually, a lot of people live in Future. - It has it’s own functioning and separate economy and ecosystem - Each spike on the edges is a landing and deployment port. - Visitors, deliveries, trash, etc. Not a lot is known about Future, except that sometimes you can look up to a “meteor shower” every two weeks! Whether it’s an escapee, a burning ball of trash, or an execution: up to you! Maybe it’s a deployment of another PiBot.
docs.title: FUTURE

docs.text: ADDITIONAL CONTEXT IS PROVIDED IN THE DEV NOTES. The backstory and lore of Khan , Marian , Shenx , Chou , Pyrrhon , Uche , and Padme . It’s a dingy night. A small boy named Marian, covered with scrapes and dirt, stumbles into a nearby town, gripping a scarf and a muddy medallion. Marian slides the medallion to an old woman, who gives him 3 months of shelter and a small wad of cash. A little less than expected, but good enough to last him a while. He stuffs it into his pockets and waddles over to a scruffy, orange-tinted man, holding a rusty tray of dry cupcakes. He sloshes over to him, kicking muddy water off of his dirty knees, and is handed a cupcake. The cupcakes, Marian would come to find, were salty, and not particularly good. But that didn’t matter, none of it did. Marian holds a pen, trembling, grime and oil smearing on clean, crisp papers. He signs his name and soul and life away for admittedly too-salty cupcakes. Marian signs away to the National Guardian— a boy raised in a religious temple, who ran away to escape those higher than him. Now, the process for becoming a National Guardian is quite complex, despite the growing need for their presence. It all begins in the Colosseum, where all candidates are trained under a group of 6-8 people for three grueling weeks. They’re trained by rough military professionals, trained to stick together like troops and to fight. It’s genuinely so horrific that many of the soldiers drop out, or die from this. This is done to weed out the weaker ones. Marian is placed in a group with Pitaches, his leader. A grumpy old man with little to no regard for anyone but himself. And another boy, named Khan. And ten others. Now, this group was Kind of like a band of misfits. The leftovers. The only two who survived the initial 12 was Khan and Marian. This is SIGNIFICANTLY less than most, with most troops ending at 4-6 people final. But that doesn’t matter. Yes, Khan and Marian hate each other. Yes, Khan thinks Marian is egotistical for his motivations. But ultimately, their shared hatred for Pithaches (pronounced Pith- ahh- keys) trumps their hatred for each other. so the final test in the Colosseum is like a hunger games sort of thing and it’s played live for the public. It’s like their NFL. They end up coming in fourth place. Welcome to the national guardian association, group 24601! Now, the real fun begins. Being a national guardian here is quite nice! Climb up the ranks, get sent on missions.. it’s like being a legal mercenary, but you don’t choose the shots— Pyrrhon does! Marian, as time goes on, grows more passive. A bit more mature. less like that immature, fierce little boy he was before and more like a stoic, warmer figure. Khan, as time goes on, grows more aggressive. A bit more immature, less like that mature, stoic, and warmer child he was before. And more like an immature, fierce, hardcore guy. They start to fight, obviously. They didn’t know what else to do. Marian, after a particularly rough mission, finds Pithaces dead in a ditch somewhere. He doesn’t tell Khan, just dragging Pithace’s corpse into a 6 foot hole and burying him silently. Without incense, without thanks or regrets. A sign was stabbed into the thick, crusted metal of the Earth which read “PITHACES” in the worst handwriting possible. Not that Marian knew how to write anyway, so it probably read something else. Anyway. He and Khan go more separate into their opposite ways. Until one day, they’re sent on a mission with Uche and Padme . Now, they were sent in particular to put down the ANGELS, a rouge AI which was taking over the dead corpses of clones in the mountains of Ngima (Reference Hà-Binh ). Now, Khan and Marian’s quarrels were so incredibly destructive that this was actually a suicide mission. They weren’t supposed to actually take out the angels. Uche and Padme are odd scenarios. Uche is a warrior, and Padme is a magician. Neither of them want to be there, but they’re attached at the hip. A packaged deal! Uche and Padme are difficult to describe. But they’re like the bookman clan in D. Gray-Man. They’re spies, not meant to really do much. Uche and Padme are just the names that they’d chosen for this mission in particular. Anyway, against all odds, after many greuling months and almost a year, the angels are completely wiped out thanks to the four of them. They call themselves the ULTIMATE DREAM TEAM!! (Two exclamation marks included). Padme and Uche, despite how much fun they had, are whisked away for their next mission. History was recorded with the angels, they have no need to be with them. Khan and Marian are lead to believe Uche and Padme died in combat right after. In reality, Uche and Padme live in the mountains together. They’ve been long retired, enjoying their lives. anyway Khan and Marian slowly begin to reconnect. About their shared hatred for Pithaces. On a particular night, tipsy and buzzed, they see a young girl being thrown out of an office building. Marian watches her with an odd curiosity. In short, he and Khan feel incredible pity for her and decide to help her get a job with the national guardian society. They find out that Chou has perfect genetics, and they whisk her away to be an egg donor. Khan and Marian think they’ve done well and go out to drink and celebrate. Chou was condemned to death. Chou is the mother of all of the clones. By the end of her days with the national guardian, she was horrifically mutated and missing an eye and both of her arms. She holds them in incredibly high regard though. For some odd reason. Kei awakens at this time. TW FOR RAPE Marian is suddenly called up to Pyrrhon’s lair. See, Pyrrhon has a strange fascination with Marian. Not because of his looks or odd morals, but simply because Kei glanced in his vague direction one day. She saw it as a ‘prophecy’, from God himself. Now, Pyrrhon’s all powerful, and her obsession with Kei has caused her to slip, and she can do whatever she wants with him… “It doesn’t even have to be human,” says Pyrrhon. “It just has to be *you*.” That child is named Nea, whom Marian really really hates. The bar is dingy, like the night that Marian sold his soul. Humid and dense, paint peeling off the walls. He talks with Khan. Not fight, Talk . Quite literally the first civil conversation Marian had had with another person in years. They talk about Pithaces. His death. Chou. Their experiences with Padme and Uche. Their other shared missions. It’s then that Marian begins to break down about … refer to the dev notes for more So, now they’ve been sent on a mission to put down TLH. Since they’re in a group, Chou was conveniently placed with them. They go to a small town. Since it’s small and not regulated by Pyrrhon’s rules, Marian buys Khan a cloak infused with magic which would usually be illegal, but since it’s not within Pyrrhon’s rules, it’s not. Khan gifts Marian a nose flute. It has magic too. And so, Marian went on a mission (his last mission). He took her, Khan, and Chou with him to finish up the mission (Chou was there because she needed to be transported— Khan and Marian just so happened to run into her). The mission was to basically put down a rebellion/rebel group named “The Last Hope”. Marian slams his sword down. “I’m done with this,” he says. “I can’t do this anymore.” Khan can’t say much. He doesn’t have much to say. He gets it, but, “You’re going to leave us?” “I don’t have to,” says Marian. “You can come with me! Y-you and Chou! And we-we can build a temple, and we can.. we can just live, you know? Both of us! Like normal guys! Y-you know?” “But—“ “But what? We-we’ll cook together and live together, and Chou’ll be fine, and Pyrrhon’s gonna leave us alone, and..” “…” “…” “Stupid, isn’t it? That’s what you always say. But, just listen to me! Just this once! It’ll happen!..” “I—..” “..,” “I can’t leave, Marian.” “…” “But I respect your decision. I wish you the best of luck.” Khan wraps his scarf around Marian’s neck. “I’ll miss you, Marian.” Marian smiles wistfully. “I hope to see you again.” (They kiss) And Marian trudges off to the distance. Khan reports that Marian died in combat. Chou says nothing. and the rest is history. Marian is later found, frost-bitten and bleeding in front of a temple in the middle of the Forrest, clutching a small baby girl. He’s taken in, only because of Nea, and he rebuilds his life as a religious leader (apart from the one he was in previously). … A particular ten year old brat drowning in his own blood and vomit stirs amongst the rubble. refer to Shenx for more information … Marian remains a pacifist, and Nea grows as a relatively stable, but a little strange child. DEV NOTES. TW FOR RAPE In short, Marian and Pyrrhon are NOT ideal. This is, in fact, the least ideal situation possible. “It doesn’t even have to be human,” says Pyrrhon. “It just has to be you .” Pyrrhon. She fully believes that what she’s doing is right. She doesn’t register Marian’s age or consent as an issue, rewriting reality to fit her needs. “Our new beginning,” she said. “Your body, your blood.. it will outlast all of us. Isn’t that beautiful? To think, that you will be a part in this?” Marian has no power to say no. He does attempt to resist, thrashing out of the grip of the metallic arms. But no use, he’s injected with a tranquilizer straight to the neck. The next thing he knows, he wakes up to a clone of Pyrrhon riding him. he yells, something . But he can’t even understand his own words at that point. It’s Awful. It doesn’t feel good. But it feels oddly heavenly. sending chills up his spine and makes his guts coil together. He feels sick. He wants to throw up but he’s simply too weak. His eyes roll back into his head. It isn’t even pleasurable, he can’t feel it in the first place. Drool trickles down his cheek, eyes half-glazed over as he gazes into the eyes of THE CLONE. As if letting go of the last shreds of his life, He lets the seeds of the dandelion fly off and flutter into the wind. Marian’s vision goes black again. Anyway, Marian is kinda let out of Pyrrhon’s lair traumatized and unable to speak. He goes to a bar with Khan. He sobs, no one will believe him. And those who did, said he should be grateful for it. Khan believed him though. Khan and Marian both stop by a bar and kinda go over what’s happened to them so far. How far they’ve come. How they’re basically two halves of one whole already. Marian opens up about his past, and Khan about his. They forgive each other. his relationship with Khan turned into some odd, homoerotic relationship. Where Khan feels bad for everything he did to Marian. And Marian is fucking the shit out of Khan just to feel something, anything . Khan doesn’t know if he consents to it, but Khan just knows he’s part of the reason why this happened to Marian in the first place. He needs to help Marian. After all, Marian is his best friend, right? Marian feels nothing afterward. Not shame, nor pleasure. Just the feeling of his release churning into Khan. And Khan, he wants to help, yes. But he doesn’t know how. He doesn’t know how to say no without abandoning Marian. It’s not sex, like a dance. It’s like a mechanical ritual. With no pleasure involved, except for the churning of organs and the creaking of joints and the bed beneath them. Shenx A particular ten year old brat drowning in his own blood and vomit stirs amongst the rubble. Shenx. His parents were DEEPLY involved in TLH , and so was he. He was a fierce warrior even at like. Age ten. So of course he fought with them! Marian was kind of giving up (this is the night he left with Nea ) and Khan was super pissed off about it so he took his anger out on TLH . Khan saw Shenx and was in such a hurry to just slaughter everyone, he just sliced off Shenx's legs assuming he'd already died /would die of blood loss. Shenx did not die So his whole mission is fueled by revenge to kill Khan , and consequently Pyrrhon 's empire. He built his mech out of the remains of what was left in TLH and the dead clones that his parents killed. And went to the underground.. People generally respected this 12 year old boy walking in with no legs and a mech doing all sorts of crazy shit. He met lots of good friends (one in particular named Sho) and managed to scrape together enough money and people to revive TLH . It's an underground operation still, but they do operate. Tl;dr shenx is mad at Khan for cutting his legs off, revives a rebellion group out of spite
