docs.text: Incredibly outdated. Stickfigures are an amalgamation of flesh which evolved from RUMORS (ref WFN) - since they were ‘created’ after the world had far long ended, they had to fend for themselves and evolved into a primarily fighting-type species. - Being evolved from a species which has long followed humans since the creation, they have evolved into semi-humanoids but not entirely human. They do refer to themselves as _human_, though. Stickfigures, or Sticks, all come with the unique ability to harness magic (the very magic which killed the human race, they’ve built resilliance over time) and are extremely durable. They recover easily, they’re _made_to fight. Those who posess physical disabilities to fight, however, work in other jobs like office work. It’s more common than you might think, especially now. They are all generally pretty nice to those with disabilities. They don’t call it a disability , it’s more of a “trait”. “Your trait is the role of a healer, fascinating!” “Wow, you’re practically made for this! (receptionist)”. some stickfigures with asthma have to have a permanent bubble around them. Conviniently, there’s a company which develops these at birth. They can go through it, it’s semi-permeable, like a cell membrane, and it’s developed with that persons umbilical cord. Skin color changes based on environment. Colder colors are more common in cooler environments and warm.. you know. Hotter environments turn your skin into a more black/greyer tone than before, while cooler ones simply pale it down. Humidity gives you more depth while dryness just makes you super pale. skin color traits are incomplete dominant genes. However codominance does happen, but very rarely,
docs.title: Stickfigures

docs.text: 07 Angel is an escaped clone from generation 4. She takes great inspiration from Characters/Bosses/Prodigal and Omega to escape to Earth. As of right now, she is the ringleader of the Arena and such the final boss in it. Also just so happens to be a fixer simply because of her establishment and also because, sometimes you can’t get all of the work done yourself. She’s very unreliable, but pays a lot for difficult jobs. Personality A cold-hearted mercenary who works for herself exclusively. She’s a woman of very few words and mostly communicates by glowering down at people and/or extreme measures of violence. She’s 13 years of age and has a hate-hate relationship with everything which Is and has been existing. She’s very stubborn and refuses to listen to anyone else. That is mostly because other people are too scared to talk to her. Greatly overestimates herself, but for good reason. Relationship with Prodigal She was the one who saved Prodigal’s life, and thus revived her, causing Prodigal to go on her Gamma -obsessed rampage. 07 Angel is indifferent to Characters/Bosses/Prodigal entirely, but provides her with a place to stay since Characters/Bosses/Prodigal is a great bouncer sometimes. Upon discovering Prodigal ’s death (and thus no bouncer), she challenged Gamma to a duel to avenge her. Whether or not she's doing this because she likes Prodigal is unknown. When Gamma won, she just spat on the ground and left. her death will also initiate the Arena (wow this cool new club just opened..) Relationship With every other clone except Gamma Leaning towards positive or neutral. The only clone she hates is Gamma . since Honeycakes is Omega , she’s top of the chart. Otherwise, Honeycakes would be in the positive-neutral category. She shows a lot more mercy towards other clones. Biological beings are fucked over almost instantly. She treats them the same with little words, but at least won’t try to slit their throats and will at least attempt to listen to them for more than 4 seconds. Because Gamma caused 07 Angel to lose her best employee, 07 Angel has a vow to kill Gamma. She said that she would do it after she defeats Pyrrhon. Whether or not 07 Angel is like this because she liked Prodigal is unknown. Weaponry She fights with four small, pink daggers which she controls at her will. At the beginning, she will use two (in her hand). On her second phase of fighting or when you encounter her in an intense difficulty, she will start off with four of her daggers (two of which hover in the air and shoot at you from a distance). Like Gamma , she’s hideously fast, but not as fast. She also has a great deal more magic and range than Gamma does, and certainly has the potential to win in a match against Honeycakes , if she didn’t admire her so much.
docs.title: 07 ANGEL

docs.text: Backstory Made alongside Prodigal . When Pyrrhon created her, she mutated. Pyrrhon was disgusted, and muttered, “She’s mutilated.” That became her name. Mutilation has an obsession with Pyrrhon as her motherly figure. Pyrrhon keeps her away, but Mutation knows almost all of her secrets because she’s so nosy (including all of her clones and dirty secrets), so Pyrrhon is forced to spoil her. She’s gained immortality and doesn’t age. She steals body parts from soldiers she likes and places them inside of hers. Obviously some parts are already misplaced (the eye, mouth, etc were in that place at conception) so she has to put them there. She has Khan ’s leg and Chou ’s eye as of right now. She attempted to take Honeycakes (or as she knew him, OMEGA)’s leg when Khan ’s got old and rotted, but they struck up a deal instead and OMEGA provided her with lots of other people for her to take instead of his. mutilation has an obsession with being a mother, which was by proxy of Pyrrhon when Nea was conceived. However her view of ‘motherhood’ is from Pyrrhon — not the best example. She witnessed everything Marian went through and was mostly just chewing her nails and watching excitedly, not understanding what was happening. She just understood that since Pyrrhon was doing it, it must mean that it was good. Her understanding of ‘motherhood’ is more ‘abusive wife’. She enjoys submissive men, specifically soldiers. She has boned with Honeycakes but Honeycakes remembers her as the freakiest, most sadistic bitch ever who was laughing uncontrollably the entire time and drooling everywhere and screaming and sobbing, so he isn’t really interested in doing anything with her. Mutilation was created when Prodigal was, so Prodigal is quite old by affiliation. This was when Pyrrhon came into power FUN FACTS Herod makes noise by sloshing her organs around since he has no vocal chords Mutilation herself makes noise by complex technology. She commissioned an unknown scientist to have her vocal cords make noise through a radio instead of through a real mouth (since it’s in her chest). She loved him so much that she cannibalised him. Lol. Conversations (Laying down) “ahah. Hello, Herod. I’m sorry to keep you in so long. Take a seat, Omega.” (M) “…” (takes a seat) (O) “No boys like me. You know why?” (M) “Y-you’re a.. you’re that .. that thing!”(O) “Thing? How rude.” (M) “Th.. then your mouth, is..?”(O) (Rips off mouth to reveal it was sheet piece of LED and a radio) “that’s Herod. He’s my real body.” “…”(O) “Yes, yes.. well, you seem unaffected. That’s why I always go for soldiers. They’ve seen much, much worse.” (M) “… your eye,”(O) “Yes? You like it, don’t you? I’d give it to you, but.. well, yours are rarer. So be happy I dont take those~” (M) (.. Chou…) (O) “The last man I met was Khan... didn’t care how disfigured I looked. Didn’t matter how much I took out of him. He just wanted me.. Oh, I’ve never felt so flattered since Pyrrhon created me..~” (M) “K-Khan..?! You mean, that old hag? The one who died, like twenty years ago?!” (O) “Hm? Oh, I…” (lie) “I met him, during his last days..~” (M) (Aware) “.. I see.”(O) “I’ve never found another man so eager. Then you came along. You don’t care what I look like, do you?” (M) “…”(O) (Strokes little hair piece) “… hm~ I like this. You should keep it growing. I hear that it’s quite popular among young troops.” (M) “… (blush).”(O) “Now, shall we begin?” (M) “But, I-…”(O) “Getting cold feet? (Sigh) how silly. But now that you’ve seen me, I might have to kill you.” (M) “Don’t get ahead of yourself.”(O) “Ho, ho? You’re strong. A really strong man..~ why don’t you come here? I’ll show you a really good night.” (M) Side Quest Honey: I saved both of your pathetic lives. You’re coming with me. Gamma: it’s … it’s 3 in the morning..? Honey: I’m here to beat morning traffic, not listen to you complain. Get moving. Nea, you come too. Gamma: she’s passed out. She won’t wake up. Honey: is that so? Well, load her up. Make sure she doesn’t run, so tie her up. Gamma: wh-what if she wakes up..?! Honey: she’ll be fine. I won’t let anything happen to her. Gamma: .. Honey: You want to be a real clone soldier? Then listen to me. I’m your superior. Let’s get moving. Gamma: tch. Honey’s goal: get Chou ’s eye Why? It has Chou ’s DNA— her DNA. Why? She just wants to have it. Now, Mutilation is extremely strong and quite literally revives herself. She’s rich and lives deep, deep in the mountain. She has guards and everything. Gamma: how did you even meet her..!? Honey: Like me, she’s a high up. You’re a soldier, act like it. Gamma: Y-.. yes ma’am! Honey’s a bit suicidal which is why she made this plan up in the first place. But she’s tired of Mutiliation’s very existence, so she brings in Nea. She discovered that Nea has a directly opposite blood type to Mutilation, AND Marian’s CORE. Since Marian’s CORE is covered with Nea’s blood and is a newer CORE update, she will explode internally. So when Mutilation's CORE comes in contact with Marian’s CORE, it will attempt to auto-update to absorb Marian's CORE. However, since her CORE is a custom job, the CORE realizes that a lot of checksums are missing and then realizes that something is wrong. Since it realizes that it has been tampered with, it will corrode instantly, killing Mutilation instantly, since it will kill her before she’s able to revive herself. with Mutilation: “.. you haven’t aged a day.”(H) “Ah? Hmm.. I see you’ve heeded my advice” (strokes Honey’s hair). “You look so beautiful like that. (Begins to feel around Honeycakes) and.. what’s this?” “…”(H) “A sex change? Well, not to worry. I don’t care. Science can do many things, including me. Hahahah.” “I brought what you wanted.”(H) “Hm?” “Marian’s daughter. The lover of… your lover.”(H) “wh-what?!”(G) “Wheel her in.” (H) “That-.. wasn’t part of our plan!” (G) “That’s right. It’s part of mine.”(H) “You.. you traitor!” (G) “Don’t forget your place. You work under me.”(H) “… (fidgeting)”(G) “And your eye?”(H) “Hm? Oh, yes…” (flicks up hair) “it’s gorgeous, isn’t it? It’s fresh, too. Shame I have to give it away.” “I don’t want that one. I want the other one.” “Uh? The one from that little girl?” “Chou.” “Ah, yes.. I remember. Your mother..~ a real cute one, she was. I loved her, so much..~ she barely lasted. Barely lasted..” “Here.” (Tosses sandwich) “they’re mantises.” “Ah!~ you remembered? Awww, Herod says he loves you~” (Incomprehensible noises from Herod) “…” Herod sinks its teeth into Nea’s shoulder, as Honey instructs. That is where Honeycakes planted a bit of Nea ’s core, so Herod recoils and begins to melt and corrode. However she put too little and Mutilation catches onto the plan and attacks them. .. only she doesn’t. Mutilation pins down Nea as she groggily begins to wake up and gets really freaky. “I know ou. I know you! I KNOW YOU!!! I KNOW YOU!!! Mother , youre my father my father my father MY FAHTER!! YOURE MY FAHTER.. “ She thinks that Marian is her father, and since it’s Marian ’s CORE.. Marian isn’t her father, she was just Pyrrhon ’s ‘’lover’’ Anyway the vicinity between Mutilation and Marian ’s CORE kinda fucks things up and Nea goes into a deep, deep digital flashback. so does Mutilation It lasts a second for Gamma and Honeycakes . But in there, Nea basically is attacked by Marian (mutilation). She stabs him, and Mutilation says, “you’ve done so well..” She gets flashbacks to when Marian offered her his CORE. The sensation is so intense that it disrupts the connection and backfires on Mutilation, killing her instnatly. Nea wakes up seeing Honey hanging up Mutilation like a slab of meat and sifting through the organs she wants to keep. She has Han cool them for her in a portable cooler. Gamma is mostly making sure Nea is okay Honey: … Alright. That’s about 10k Danari. Gamma: wh-.. WHAT??? NO ONE IS WORTH THAT MUCH!!! Honey: look at these organs. They’re branded. Don’t you see the variety? You scan them yourself. They’re soldiers— good soldiers. And these are in good shape. Gamma: you know, if you wanted to sell organs, you could’ve just became a Merc! Honey: hah. No, it was just this one time. I just wanted to get one , but.. 10k Danari is a nice farewell gift from her.❤️ She plucks out Chou’s eye and places it into a jar. Honey: there we are. Gamma: the hell is that? Honey: It’s your mother’s eye. It’s Chou’s eye. Gamma: …! Honey: obviously Chou is dead. I don’t intend on reviving her. Think of these as, “her ashes”. Gamma: wh-.. what did you plan to do with them? Honey: look at it. Gamma: …? Honey: did you think I was going to clone her? I have a business to run. I just wanted to look at her. Gamma: that’s why you risked NEA’S LIFE??! Honey: well, look. She’s alive, isn’t she? And she killed Mutilation. Honey: don’t worry. You both can keep 10 thousand D each. I already counted our shares. Han! Load up the cart, we’re going to Ritas!
docs.title: Mutilation

She is Gamma ’s best friend and a later boss in arc 1. Before she re-encountered Gamma, she lived with 07 ANGEL and stole food from Honeycakes .
docs.title: Prodigal

docs.text: ”Let’s see what your pitiful hope looks like under 8 trillion Kelvin.” the primary antagonist of CORE. The current world leader. Personality A bit of a maniac, if it wasn’t obvious. A well put together public figure. Not much is known about her. Nobody’s even seen her in years. Pyrrhon is more of an entity than anything. Do you think that the ghost in her shell is still there? Backstory Pyrrhon, as a child, was relatively ignored. Her real name is unknown She had three older brothers and two parents. Two older brothers have moved to get higher education, but the third stayed in the nearby area since he got accepted into the aerospace industry. Pyrrhon, initially, wasn't super great at school, but her brother took her into his aerospace workplace and she tell in love. She got insane results and actually graduated college early to get that job with him. (Her parents neglected her a lot. No matter what she did, she couldn't do it). So after about a year, they plan to send her brother to space, since he's very physically active and good at this stuff. That day was November 10, 203 BFC. God's CORE fell to the ground and intercepted her brother. He died as God came down from heaven. All that was left was the CORE, which had landed right in her hands. So she got to work, and built her empire. Her parents took credit for her work, so she killed them and used them for experimentation. It's the first time she realized that she has that power, and then, discovered the work of early human eugenics, and, with the CORE, set out to create the perfect society to erase all pain. Kei GOAL Pyrrhon has seen wars. Pyrrhon has lived the wars, Pyrrhon has been the war. She inevitably determines, after lots of mediating, why wars occur: differences. racial wars, wars of differing view points, wars because someone thinks they deserve more land than the other.. Humans as a sheer concept are corrupt, in her eyes. all except for her. If everyone could just think just like her.. If everyone was a clone, a perfect being— a genetically perfect being, then wars should not begin. So Pyrrhon began to create CLONES. Corrupted at first, but eventually became entirely self sufficient, and more importantly, living in her own image. Her end goal is to perfect an army of clones, use Kei and FUTURE (basically the death star), destroy earth, and rebuild it in her perfect image. “You’ve been created in my image, whether you like it or not.” “Stand down, or I will do it myself.” “Of course you’re perfect. I created you.”
docs.title: Pyrrhon

docs.text: Commonly labeled as Constantine’s evil brother. They are not related. Clement is a worker at the nearby contemporary church, but he mostly works as a spy and for public relations with those interested in TLH. He’s very charismatic and doesn’t really mind getting a few drinks and twisting the rules for his own benefit. Kind of a scoundrel. Quite manipulative and focuses on himself. Constantine hates him with a very burning passion but Clement teases him. He’s quite a good fighter. He doesn’t do very much. You can talk to him on occasion and he’s doing something or, if you bother him on a bad day of his, he’ll give you money to leave you alone. His outer disguise is as a worker at the nearby church, as stated. He works as an alter boy and is known for his beautiful choir voice and being the perfect angel. He is not. He is a twink ass bitch. Clementine is sort of like a smiley.. Taiyo-ish.. strange and eccentric guy. He's self centered and works exclusively for himself. He doesnt even believe in the religion he's working for, he just does it for clout and benefits actually. Constantine doesn't agree with 90% of Clementines moral standings (which is ironic considering his line of work). Anyway, they do end up working together sometimes so people have theorized that they're in a relationship with each other.
docs.title: Clementine

docs.text: Gamma is prone to psychotic and manic episodes. She's canonically bipolar so a normal day for her and Constantine would go like this. Gamma nears the end of her euphoric high. Something ticks her off and she ends up spiraling into mania or psychosis She accepts every job available and kills everything she can, mostly at the cost of her own life. Her fixers alert Constantine , who passively throws food her way so she doesn't die. Gamma eats it up. She spends a few hours mutilating corpses (cutting them up, eating their organs, playing with them, (REDACTED)ing them, throwing them around, or playing with them like dolls). After a while she gets bored and fights until she drops. Constantine sedates her and takes her home at this time She usually beats him up and they fight Gamma : "The version of myself you cling so dearly to is long dead and gone! I don't understand why you keep coming back?! Are you stupid? You love like a fucking DOG. I fucking hate you. I hate you so goddamn much. Are you fucking stupid? JUST LEAVE ME ALONE!!!! I don't need your comfort-- I don't want your comfort you stupid fucking MUTT!! The ' Gamma ' you love so dearly is DEAD!!! DO YOU GET KT YET, YOU DUMB FUCK DOG? OR DO YOU NEED ME TO KICK YOUR CHEST IN FOR YOU TO GET IT?!! I HATE YOU!!!! I HATE YOU SO MUCH!! WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE?! WHY WH--" ( Gamma short circuits) Constantine , covered in blood and bruises shakily gets up and drags her back to his room, repairing her slowly through the night. Gamma remembers none of it again, but the crusts in her limbs are stained with dried blood. Constantine just stares down at her with hollow cheeks and sunken eyes Lips cut and cheeks burnt ... Constantine alters Gamma s memories CONSTANTLY. He feels guilty for it but "it's for her own good". Gamma doesn't know bc if she did she would probably kill him for real. so this night wouldn't happen in her ram. But it exists in long term. His reasoning for this heavily is based on "If she remembers, she'll spiral (if she remembers, my creation leaves me)." Gamma is very heavy on the self sustainable, non tampered version of clones. she despises memory and consciousness editing. Constantine does it half for his own safety but also half for himself. If Gamma fails, it's like. Gamma is his reason for living. He doesn't see her as a person, he sees her as his project and his pride and joy. "She -she doesn't want to remember anyway! I'm the only one who can save her.." he doesn’t believe Gamma can handle herself without him. Which is true, but also ableist on his part. This isn't his call to make. Constantine is NOT a good person, I want to make this very very clear. None of the core characters are good people. Not at all. He adds fake memories of Gamma , so she pretends to have had a great childhood. To have has amazing friends, instead of face reality. Constantine can't break down and cry about it because that'll risk his identity. That's why he's so close to Shenx, because Shenx knows what he does to Gamma and it's the most powerful blackmail material out of ALL of them. It's why he's so obsessed to sucking shenx's dick in every aspect and why Shenx absolutely revels in it He isn’t noble. He’s not healthy. He’s addicted to Gamma as a concept, to the ghost of the girl he thinks he saved, and to his own guilt and messiah complex. He takes hits like a dog because he doesn’t believe he deserves anything better. And really, maybe he doesn’t. He knows she’ll tear him apart—physically, mentally, spiritually—but he doesn’t care. He's given up, maybe.
docs.title: Constantine and Gamma

docs.text: Requires previous readings of Honeycakes Does Honey love Regina? *no not really. She more so sees Regina as a mother figure. She’s willing to do almost anything for Regina, sex or murder or just plain ol’ work. She’s like, “Regina has accepted me for who I am. loved the unlovable. And I think that’s beautiful”. Granted Regina is kind of a sadist, but Honey is a lot better because of Regina. She Was careful to not make the same mistakes she did with her other friends. She’s matured a lot.*
docs.title: Regina n Sam

docs.text: Backstory Tto talk about Shenx we need to talk about Marian Nea was born, and Marian went on a mission (his last mission). He took her, Khan , and Chou (his friend) with him to finish up the mission. The mission was to basically put down a rebellion/rebel group (it was TLH ...) Clementine Shenx. His parents were DEEPLY involved in TLH , and so was he. He was a fierce warrior even at like. Age ten. So of course he fought with them! Marian was kind of giving up (this is the night he left with Nea ) and Khan was super pissed off about it so he took his anger out on TLH . Khan saw Shenx and was in such a hurry to just slaughter everyone, he just sliced off Shenx's legs assuming he'd already died /would die of blood loss. Shenx did not die So his whole mission is fueled by revenge to kill Khan , and consequently Pyrrhon 's empire. He built his mech out of the remains of what was left in TLH and the dead clones that his parents killed. And went to the underground.. People generally respected this 12 year old boy walking in with no legs and a mech doing all sorts of crazy shit. He met lots of good friends (one in particular named Sho) and managed to scrape together enough money and people to revive TLH . It's an underground operation still, but they do operate. Tl;dr shenx is mad at Khan for cutting his legs off, revives a rebellion group out of spite Shenx actually discovered Marian and Khan again through Nea . I mean, Nea was Marian 's daughter that night. so he wasn't very pleased to find that out. He found out when he went to the hotel inn. They're all legally required to have a small pond for religious folk to meditate (treaty with nomads from a past war requires it). Shenx used it to take showers so when Nea showed up like to actually USE it to meditate he felt really bad. He tried to say "oh this is how I meditate uh uh uh" and she honestly couldn't give less of a shit. They started talking about religion and Nea just stared at him like, "you're reallty bad at this". Anyway the conversation lead to his missing legs, and he discovered taht she was Marian 's daughter. So she was almost stabbed that night if it weren't for Gamma . Nea agreed to bring Khan to TLH for Shenx in return for safety and a place to stay. This is a storyline that probably wont be canon, but I still have it. Khan is bound to a chair. Shenx just takes his unconscious body outside to the forest for a week. No one can find or contact him at all. No one knows where the hell he actually is or if he's ever coming back. Shenx kind of went on this.. psychotic breakdown on Khan ? Khan is actually still alive, but he was BADLY injured. Shenx said he wanted to fight him to the death to show him what he had learned since the last time they met. Khan said "who the fuck are you? What's TLH ?" So his lungs were pierced. Shenx is a bartender so he's like the therapist for everyone. so combine that with his own problems and issues, all bottled up... They fought so much that they died up in No Man's Land which is entirely out of Pyrrhon 's control. Shenx almost pierced his heart, but purposefully missed. He just bascially tortured Khan out in the forest and left him there. Khan is still alive, but just barely. He is still up and kicking even post game. Shenx just returns like nothing happened, but yk.. still shaken up about .. everything... He crashed at Constantine 's place first. He was covered in blood and crawling on the ground since his mech broke. He had the wide eyed bipolar schizophrenia look so Constantine surprisingly calmly took him in and treated him. If it weren't for Constantine , Shenx might've died. Or at least be chronically ill. This storyline isn't canon, but it exists Uhhhhmmm Personality He is a laid-back, smart and sweet talking bartender. He flirts with his regulars and cooks up a really good drink. However, it’s all a facade. He acts as everyone’s therapist and has trouble putting himself first. He’s genuinely intelligent and kind-hearted towards those he likes. However, Shenx is not trusting of anyone at all. He tends to fly into a violent rage when he gets mad, and, when pushed, can grow psychotically strong. Shenx is a very sweet man. He flirts with … everyone really often, and enjoys watching them squirm. He’s very easygoing, but is a bit mischievous. He tends to be selfish and will do things that benefit him first. He does not hesitate to use blackmail or manipulate others to his needs

docs.title: Sho

docs.text: MOTHER CLONE ”N-no—! I’m not the killer! Please, someone…! Help me-help me, please!” Chou is the secondary ’perfect genetic being’, which makes her the mother of all clones, since Pyrrhon used her. Personality Chou’s a bit like Constantine in the crippling anxiety sense. That’s about it. She spends most of her time jumping around and on the verge of tears from the slighest movement. I’m surprised she isn’t dead yet, especially since Mutilation likes watching her squirm. She’s anxiety incarnate, shaking and trembling and spends the other part of her time cowering in fear from those higher up from her. … despite that, she remains to be the most sane despite her own anxiety-induced hallucinations and delusions. While her brain does overload sometimes, she’s still quite motherly to all clones including Gamma , Honeycakes , 07 ANGEL , Phi , etc. She views them as her children and does her best to be fond with them. While she is old and rotting, she is still very kind. Backstory Chou was originally some nobody worker working with a high up corporation, working late nights to barely sustain herself. Five years at school, for this..? She works as a normal secretary, underpaid and overworked, like Isabelle from Animal Crossing. She’s always stressed out and paranoid, jumpy and spends most of her time cowering in fear from her bosses. On one unfortunate night, Marian and Khan raided the place under Pyrrhon ’s orders. That corporation was hiding some unfortunate information, and they needed everyone dead. That was, until, Marian ’s phone beeped. A perfect genetic being..? They took Chou away under the guise of ‘medical help’ to have her get testing. She was the perfect genetic being. Too scared to resist, she was taken under and forced to reproduce eggs and undergo testing that borderlines on torture. She befriended both Marian and Khan . Khan , because Chou reminded him of his sister. Marian , because, during the second half of the Prequel Arc, and he felt pity for her. Khan had completely neglected her and she felt quite sad. I really don’t have much to say about her, im going to be real. Her eye was stolen by Mutilation . Relations Misc

docs.title: Kei

docs.text: Khan’s like that kid at the back of the classroom. He’s the quiet kid with the dead sister. The one who he joined the army for, just for her to die a few days after acceptance. He’s the kid with the too-big ego and that fart of an old master. He’s the guy with the scars under his eyes and pursed lips and mutters about whatever war, and Chou , and Marian, and Chou again. Khan grew up in a temple in what was Southeast Asia as a monk of an unknown religion. He was the second youngest child in a family of sixteen children(mostly non blood related), who’d all either abandoned him or left for jobs in the bigger city. The temple was already failing, and so was his sister. And his sister was all he had to him, he was his sister, two halves of one whole, identical in their stoic nature and unmoving eyes. They were one of the same, so Khan grasps her hands for one last time. ”I’ll come back.” She stared at him with those pupiless eyes of hers. ”Please.” And thus marked the day of Khan’s life of war. He wasn’t a huge fan of Pithaces, but he wasn’t a big fan of Marian either. Not that he had any particular reason to dislike Marian, but simply because Marian _was in the way of his cash reward. A little brat who ran away for his own personal gain. he remembers fighting through that coliseum alongside Marian and that rotting corpse of a swordsman, he remembers bleeding and sobbing and fighting until his limbs fell off and fat dribbled out from his arms. He remembers so much. Too much. He remembers his sister’s face when he returned. Lifeless. Khan tries not to think about that part. Now living his life in a desolate island, helping out in whatever temple needed him and running his own (albeit very unstable) small farm. Pyrrhon had no use for him anymore, he’d passed the required age. (But he hadn’t self-destructed, yet.) His life of fighting is over. Will they remember you when you’re gone? He spots the eye of an oddly familiar girl on the street, And all he once knew was now obsolete in the face of God Himself.
docs.title: Khan

docs.text: Personality Adam is a real fucking piece of work. A well-natured guy who feeds off of adrenaline, fear, and strange fetishes. Enjoys the taste of iron and flesh. Has rabies probably. If you look at him he’s shaking and drooling and barely able to contain himself. Very erratic and switches moods frequently. Extremely impatient but has compassion for his friends and his friends only . Fighting Style Physical attacker with high defense but low speed. Not particularly a tank, since most of his stats go into offense than defense. His fits grow to comically large sizes and he uses it to tackle and pin down people. Due to his genetics and sharp teeth (if you look closely they have barbs), he will just gnaw off people’s arms and ropes and wires. NO magical capabilities whatsoever. Dinh describes him as a hawk, since he usually hides in the shadows (usually walking on all fours), then lunches at his prey with his hands. He keeps his victim pinned down while he severs the central nerve in their neck with his teeth and feeds. he has the jaw of a panda and can chew through almost anything. he also doesnt mind how many things taste, BUT he exclusively eats meat. He will spit out everything else. Relations Kit : Ah, god. She’s so cute. I gotta keep her safe. And what the hell is in those dolls?! C’mon, Kit, get behind me! I’ll handle these guys. you’re so cute when you tremble like that! (Takes joy in terrorizing her). Omega : the only one who really gets me, but he can be such a Jerk! Dinh : stuck up princess. But, we’re on the same page sometimes.
docs.title: Adam

docs.text: Coda is Nea s ex-boyfriend. They, unlike Baluch and Nea , are on great terms. His full name is Coda#4 (Coda-Sharp-Four) Personality Coda is a hesitant, soft-spoken guy for such a great musician. He’s charming and cool to the public, but in private, he mostly likes to be alone. He’s not really struggling, but he isn’t particularly famous either. Has a great moral code, but will do what he needs to do to survive. Coda isn’t a great fighter, so he tends to avoid conflict. He can use magic (the conductors wand which he uses, which can also serve as a bow for his double bass if he so wishes) to launch soft projectiles. He just doesn’t really like fighting, he has other things to worry about. Coda’s kind of a wallflower. He sticks to himself and prioritizes himself. Of course, Nea does too, but she’s a lot meaner about it. Family Coda comes from a distinct family of people. The family line goes something like this: (bassie, Altima, tena, mezzimo, and sorprania) (ionia) Unlike the rest of his family, he is not a part of the mafia. He instead enjoys rock and jazz, and conducts in his own little jazz band: Mixie (play on Mixolydio, his grandfather.) with Nea . Coda-sharp-four is his full name. This is because his family has already exhausted all music terms, so he could either be named sforzando b3 (Flat three) or Coda#4. The sharps are reserved for the men, while the flats are reserved for the women. Obviously the number will change based on how many times the name was used. While additions like these are for chords, they had to make do with it. There is a man in his family named Cmajb55. Relationship With Nea Nea played the Tenor sax, And Coda was their bassist (Electric and trad). Nea was the most advanced in music theory and was their best player. They’d both had similar experiences with hating music in their childhood, so they got along quite well. Since Coda and Nea both enjoy music, they were extremely close, like brother and sister. Coda and Nea were kind of pressured to date each other by his family (and whatever was left of Nea’s), so they did. They kissed a few times, but they weren’t really romantically in love at all. They eventually broke up and decided to be friends. She still plays in Mixie, but much less frequently. Coda is (somewhat) understanding (He doesn’t know what she’s even talking about) of her situation, and the rest of Mixie just assumed she’d died or something, or that she had gotten into a big fight with Coda. They’re quite well off, though. Nea doesnt have much real resentment towards Coda. it was weird for her to not be shamed and beaten by whatever boyfriend she had at the time. She dislikes coda for that reason.
docs.title: Coda

docs.text: Personality Dinh is an asshole. Fights with daggers. Doesn’t talk much and mutters out every single sentence. It’s difficult to hear her. She likes gothic clothing and sharp objects. Arguably the most level headed of the group, and leads everyone around. They mostly interpret her commands by just the situation at hand and her body movement. Currently holds the most resentment towards Honeycakes , since she and Omega were the main subjects of their fight Fighting Style Midrange stealth shark. good with both short and long range (long is chip, short is good dmg). Most of her stats go into speed and magic defense, though her offense is quite low and is prone to physical attacks. Throws daggers of various origin at her opponent, not controlled by magic. Alternatively, her fingers are embedded with a ’nail launcher’, which fire off sharp spikes at high speeds. Usually she will hit you with her long range knives first, then while you’re stunned, will come up behind you and slit your throat. Quite good with being silent and sneaky, which makes her a good shark. However catching her off guard means that she’s done for. The most observant, but also the most hesitant of the group. Relations Kit : pathetic little girl. But she is useful. I’m sorry you have to deal with those two (Adam and OMEGA). I hate them more than I hate you, so I will help you out. Adam : Incompetent brute. but a good fighter when he decides to listen to me. Omega : Too loud, but our best fighting unit.
docs.title: Dinh

docs.text: Personality Kit is a ??? Year old with nothing in her head. She, like Dinh , is also barely able to be heard and speaks though mutters. Unlike Dinh , she speaks frequently and sounds like a white noise machine. Kit also shakes (mostly out of fear and anxiety) and finds it extremely hard to speak for herself at all. She has incredible anxiety which is NOT helped by Adam and spends most of her time trembling in fear. Dinh feels very bad for her and tries to give her some peace away from Omega and Adam , but they both find pleasure in seeing Kit fall over and sob so they ruin her day always. Kit has no idea what the hell is happening at any time since she is too scared to even remember a single thing. The reason she has her dolls there is because she crafts them to fight for her, since she is terrified of pain Fighting Style Well. She stands at a far distance and fires off her dolls. Extreme magic capabilities since the dolls do have mild sentience. if she had grown up, she could have easily started a whole new religion due to her power. However she did not. The dolls run and grasp at the victim while she runs in fear. Strength in numbers! They will tear the victim fully apart using brute force (their limbs do have rocks. individually, they’re quite painless. But, when there’s about twenty of them…) she is like Bedman from Guilty Gear, but instead of a single entity it’s just a multitude of entities. In game, hypothetically, pressing the attack button would have a doll run out from Kit’s bag and just run straight forward. if you spam it enough, you can lag your game out but also erase anything on GROUND level. air enemies? She can just run and Hide. Luckily, she’s good at running away from issues. Relations Her thoughts on: Adam : My Big brother.. (positive connotation) Omega : my older brother… (negative connotation) Dinh : scary,, but she is still my mom.

In game, hypothetically, pressing the attack button would have a doll run out from Kit’s bag and just run straight forward. if you spam it enough, you can lag your game out but also erase anything on GROUND level. air enemies? She can just run and Hide. Luckily, she’s good at running away from issues.

docs.title: Chi

docs.text: Not a clone, but not anything else either. Just a guy running from his student loans like everyone else. Belongs to Hà-Binh “... Who are you, again?” Personality He’s like, that guy. Imagine the one with ADHD who says unhinged shit, but flourishes in things like art, animation, and movie analysis and likes Scott the Woz. He’s like that but for engineering and warships. His above all special interest is studying Pyrrhon ’s COREs and learning about the past human civilization. Constantine is pretty cautiously offensive. Passive aggressive. Heavy restraint. He’s generally timid and cautious, and extremely unathletic. kind of a NEET, a pathetic loser NEET. if if weren’t for Gamma , he'd be executed via his student loans. He has pretty crippling anxiety with people who aren’t his very close friends. Otherwise he’s really sarcastic and kind of mean He's an alcoholic who relies on various drugs to keep himself awake and lively, so he likes Shenx He's really only comfortable and openly mean in front of Gamma , they're non-familial siblings. A loser, but a smart (and stubborn) loser. Oh, and Cassidy His outside disguise before TLH is as a mechanic. His personal workshop is a small stall wedged in-between two large buildings. He’s really good but not well known. He mostly only works for himself and his friends. He’s the main mechanic in TLH . He has scars from a bad burning accident while his dad was fucking with chemicals. He's physically fine. But he's so ugly he wears a welding mask to cover it up. Backstory Constantine was born into a little family in current-day Philipines, up in Bontoc. He lived in a small village, with very little access to technology except for things like fliphones and creaky computers. This is because it rains almost all the time, and most of the houses are made of tar, planks, leaves, metal sheets, etc. His parents never really let Constantine out of the house. It was against their religion to abort or abandon him, so they just locked him inside of the closet so he wouldn’t rat them out. They got tax benefits, and played it off as, ‘he’s very sick’. He was raised entirely online and by the internet, through chat rooms and such. He spent most of his time on (YouTube), scrolling on social media, involving himself in cheesy old forums, playing old games, etc. On one particularly bad night, Constantine was almost fatally injured by his father experimenting to make illegal drugs at home. He had walked in at bad times and ended up with awful chemical burns which left his face extremely disfigured and ugly. To cover them up, he wears a welding mask (he does actually know how to weld, since it’s what he does for a living.) As he got older, he saw a few videos of people doing live surgeries on clones and other machines, and developed such a large hyperfixation for it, he’d actually managed to write and create a master guide for clone, CORE, and Pi-Bot mechanics, due to his extensive research and abundance of time. This was a revolutionary thing, since it’d never been compiled so easily for everyone. He also got a lot better at coding from this, and eventually got a few jobs (he’d illegally gotten into a few databases for his master list). As Constantine grew older and more isolated, he built up his online reputation more and more. He works as a mechanic, but also as a blackmailer. his work partner is a girl named XETA, who has a huge crush on him but he’s gay. She was the one who knocked some sense into him about the ‘classic redditor views’ he had. On another awful night of his, with his hands embedded with glass shards and tinted with blood, he walked out into his backyard with a gun, intending to end his life. He saw a star in the distant night. Small at first, but then grew into a hideously large explosion right next to him. As the dust settled, he’d noticed a very small, delicate clone beneath him. His first instinct was to dissect her, which was exactly what he did. There is a full, well-documented website about this. He did it live while taking great care not to reveal himself (which he kind of did well). He extracted all of the software inside of Gamma since she was intact. It’s rare since they’re usually destroyed on impact by default. He sold the data to some people on the internet, then got quite a bit of money. After a few days of Gamma sitting there collecting dust, he decided to rebuild her (which wasn’t documented for some reason) and save her. He didn’t really know what to do with her, and mostly just sent her out to get him food from the outside. They eventually struck a deal which was essentially, Since you saved my life, I’ll get you away from your parents, which Constantine accepted. From his fundings on the internet, he was sent to a school and got a license to be a mechanic/technician. Gamma left shortly after. Constantine is actually in horrific debt due to that (he vastly underestimated the cost and kind of got scammed) and is currently evading taxes and running a ‘mechanic shop’ (dark web/blackmail business) to keep himself alive for longer. Relationship with… Relationship with Shenx Constantine and Shenx have a pretty cooperative deal together. Constantine gives him information and Shenx provides him with basic needs. Shenx is essentially his boss and hires Constantine to get leads on gov officials. The rest of Shenx ’s team, like Sho , do all of the physical work. it took a very, very long time for Constantine to warm up to Shenx since he has pretty crippling anxiety, but it did happen and they’re inseparable now. People speculate if they are dating. Constantine pretty vehemently denies it. Shenx doesn’t seem to care. Relationship with XETA So people like to joke with Constantine saying that Xeta is his discord girlfriend. He likes to beat them back up. He's kind of scrawny so he just grumbles and leaves. He's a little gay twink (all compsci majors are). Xeta does actually really like Constantine but keeps her distance because she respects him. You can meet Xeta in game! Since she helps Const with work a lot. Xeta donated some money for him to rent a studio apartment where he currently runs his work. However, as Constantine took on more and more mercenary work, the less and less Xeta approved. It ended with a truce. But, not all truces last that long. Relationship with Clementine Next to him is a small church. One of the altar boys is named Clementine. He also deals with general dark-ish web deals, but not to the extent Constantine does. I think Constantine met Shenx when he was dealing with business. So he consequently met Clementine then. Clementine met Shenx and shortly joined TLH after because he had intel in the church he was in which is CRAZY powerful. So Clementine was there and Constantine and him didn't get along very well People like to call Clementine "Constantine's evil twin" because they're just complete opposites and bash each other's heads in constantly. Clementine is eh friends with Gamma. He's genuinely a huge piece of shit but they're civil to her. They work really well together, as a fighting duo. And with Clementine, they're all really good together. Shenx uses a mech, Clementine uses a weird spear thing, and Constantine uses his computer (he shields and supports his team). Shenx and Constantine's first major interaction was when they raided a huge party. They needed this piece of tech from a mansion and they both knew it was a suicide mission, but said "eh fuck it. Nah, l'd win!" So they dressed up together. Const actualy had to dress up as a girl in order to get in so Clementine really enjoyed blackmailing him with that. It's pretty heavily implied that Constantine and Shenx boned. Anyway Constantine just gets really shy around Shenx. People also theorize that about Shenx and Constantine Shenx is like the stereotypical bartender. thing? He's the guy with no legs if you remember him. He's just an overall sweet guy and Constantine really appreciates him. Actually so much that Constantine goes out of his way to give Shenx elaborate gifts as a thank you (shenx has started taking on Const's rent) Relationship with Gamma Constantine and Gamma have a pretty ‘odd’ relationship. While still civil, they aren’t particularly close with each other. It’s more of a business relationship— Constantine does what he wants with her, and she helps him financially. Or so it seems It gets A lot deeper than that though. Constantine and Gamma He’s neutral about Nea . He is deeply scared of Honeycakes . Current Standings As of about right now, Constantine’s job varies from blackmail, interceptions, hacking, etc. is Constantine a good person? No. Constantine dissected his now sister and sold her data to the dark web. Constantine actively ruins people’s lives by selling their private information. Constantine blackmails people. But he is aware of that. He’s aware he’s irredeemable (is he?), and I think that’s what makes him cool. I wouldn’t say Constantine particularly enjoys being a part of the main story. He likes Shenx , and he likes Gamma . And he likes TLH , but he doesn’t really like.. everything else. He doesn’t want to be involved. Gameplay Signature Ability : Technician All items that Constantine uses get a boost to whatever their effect is (ie damage, debuff rate, healing percentage, buff duration, etc). At his final skill, Constantine is granted a 20% chance of ‘revivability’ Each time he uses an item. This basically means that whenever he uses an item, there’s a 20% chance it will reactivate at 50% of its original power, which then makes it to be 150% + whatever his bonus is. If the 20% roll fails, gain a frustration meter. When frustration is at max, the next buff is guaranteed at 200%. Certain equipment can guarantee that 20% always fails OR is always guaranteed.) Extended Ability : Wormded Ability: WORM When pressing special attack while shooting, deploy a digital worm into an enemy’s neural system. Enemies afflicted with WORM suffer -25% movement speed -25% attack speed +5% incoming damage (Note: The movement and attack speed debuffs do not stack.) If a WORM-afflicted enemy is killed or leaves the screen, the WORM transfers to the enemy with the highest ATK currently on-field. If multiple enemies share the highest ATK, it targets the nearest one to the dead enemy. If no valid enemies remain, the WORM returns to Constantine. WORMs last 15 seconds on a host. You may deploy a maximum of two. If both worms infect the same enemy, that enemy takes +15% extra damage, but ATK/MOV speed debuffs remain at -25%. Role : Long Range Heavy Hitter Did you know that Honeycakes is faster than this bastard? He wields a huge machine gun which weighs him down to the ground basically. Base : Snuffr Constantine has this huge rifle. The bullet will despawn once hitting the edge of the camera, essentially giving you range to hit whatever is in your view. He is kind of stationary, and can move and air-dodge while aiming, but it doesn’t help. His Rifle can pierce through multiple enemies and can actually ricochet off of walls if it’s upgraded enough. Shift : Thick Skin Constnatine, in true idiot fashion, will pull out his riot shield. He’ll swing it around, similarly to how Honey swings her hammer, but at a significantly faster rate. While they deal much less damage, he can do small combos and move around better. When guarding, all bullets are reflected and physical attacks have a small chance to stun the opponent. Also, gain significantly reduced defense. Successful parries gain additional ADRENALINE. Enemies killed while stunned have a +40% drop rate. Every 30 seconds, release an electric pulse (can be sent out on player input) to damage enemies. ULTIMATE “Patch notes” Old ability: Indomitable • Constantine locks it in! Each critical hit which he deals regenerates 100% of the inflected damage as health to Constantine. This effectively cancels out any thorns effect. He already has a pretty high crit dmg and crit rate, but his base attack is extremely low. • This will activate every time he lands 5 hits or more on a combo. • Each mega shield summoned will grant permanent regen for the duration of it’s life. • Passive • None Old ultimate: The Hospital Floor • Constantine revives ALL teammates by 25% of their max health, and grants them all a destructibel shield once tagging in. He also throws down a small pool of golden liquid, which can heal anyone in the range of it, excluding enemies. • If you press his special, he will revive all teammates by 100%, but then kill himself afterwards.

docs.title: Gameplay

docs.text: ”It’s just you, me, and the end of the world, Nea!” Personality Gamma’s this sorta hyperactive, one extreme to the next, all or nothing sort of thinker. Not so insane as everyone else, surprisingly, and has the most amount of compassion for other people than anyone else. On the outside, like at work, she’s this crazy trigger happy mercenary who kills as she pleases. She completely disregards her own health and defenses, which make a lot of people think she is suicidal. She takes great joy in innards in general, but she’s at least very good at her job. But surprisingly, she’d do anything for her friends. She’s quite gullible and brash and loves like a dog— complete and unconditional love. She’s extremely quickly paced and switches very drastically between her emotions, but still prioritizes everyone else above herself. I’m sure you know where this goes. This actually stresses her out greatly and she has essentially trained herself to enjoy the pain which is how she gets out her stress— gore. Gore gore and more gore. Gamma will fight until the day she dies. In fact, that’s how she hopes to go out. As an explosion, rather than a long drawn-out flame. Backstory Gamma was born into a 16-year-old-female-titanium skeleton within generation 3 ( even though Honeycakes remains to be ~10 years older than her), and is the second youngest clone in that generation outside of Epsilon . She was born prematurely, but is still quite healthy. She never particularly stood out when fighting for Pyrrhon, except until when she’d left FUTURE. Everyone else kind of ignored the newer g3 clones, and many (like Phi , Chi , and Muse ) didn’t even know that they existed. Because of her general.. being-ignored-thing, she was paired up with another Low-level clone— a cranky old gen-2, half-working piece of scrap metal named Prodigal . Over Gamma’s lifetime (from years 8-17) she grew extremely close to Prodigal , almost to the point of an obsession. Prodigal could have quite honestly cared less. Anyway, one day, Prodigal came up with a full map of FUTURE which had been dropped off of an abandoned hard-drive while she was dumpster diving. They began hatching a plan, a plan no one had thought of before: to get out of FUTURE once and for all. From 6 months of planning came the great escape from FUTURE. Their life, right in their hands, so close— As Gamma clung onto the hatch at the ceiling, Prodigal so close— BAM!! Gamma made it out alive. Prodigal did not. The last thing Gamma saw was the eyes of Pyrrhon, and nothing else, as she crashed into Earth’s surface. For some odd reason, Gamma couldn’t remember Prodigal’s face when she landed. Nor Prodigal as a concept. Where was she? Gamma was saved by Constantine , a lone compsci nerd with nothing else to do but cut himself and weep. From that, she built her career of independent hitman work and bodyguarding and whatnot. There’s something still that itches her though, and it’s the strange, black, gooey figure who appears in the corner of her vision sometimes. Relationship with... Nea "" Constantine and Gamma Misc Mercenary History Gamma’s a merc , or a mercenary, who does paid work. Despite only being on Earth for such a short period of time, she’s made quite the name for herself! But how..?! Gamma actually got her ‘big break’ by being scammed. Soon after she left Constantine’s town, she went a bit money crazy and blew her money on dumb shit. just Kidding she wanted cybernetic implants— or at least, ones that wouldn’t identify her as a clone so easily. She found one for an exceedingly good deal— a new charging port, which was almost seamless in her body. You could barely even tell it was there! It barely needed to be oiled and everything! And she didnt sleep on her side, so it’s perfect! narrator: it was not perfect Gamma soon found herself in a tub of ice, completely naked, with her clothes torn up and weapons gone. She’d been kidnapped! They weren’t going to give her Cyberwear, they were going to take hers! Gamma doesn’t remember much of the incident, or at least that’s what she says. But Rita does. The first thing that Rita saw was a blood and gut covered ceiling, with weapons and scalpels turned everywhere, and a suspiciously naked little girl in the middle of it. She’d killed all of the scavengers— and lived to tell the tale. admittedly, Rita’s first thought was not ‘is she okay’ but ‘wow i shoudl hire her!’. And that’s what she did. Gamma’s been working peacefully with Rita , Moanama , and the other Fixers peacefully ever since. Items The Comet Gamma’s trusty motorcycle! Crafted of Beryllium and carbon fiber, it’s a lightweight and air-powered monster. It’s small and already barely fits Gamma, but if she really tries, she can put two people. It floats in the air via fans rather than using wheels on the ground. It’s very compact, since she needed to hide it a lot. It’s extremely fast, but it can be destroyed easily. She’s always tending to its repairs. Metallic Fists of Unknown Origin She has no idea where they came from or why she has them, but they’re her strongest (and only) means of defense. With strong electricity conducting properties and a small gun in each, it serves as a lightweight yet heavy hitting weapon. Gameplay Gamma's play style is very heavily inspired by Akane Role : Glass cannon. Essentially, character that can deal a lot of destruction, but is highly vulnerable to attacks. Hence a “cannon”, because they're so powerful, and “glass” because they're fragile, if struck. Gamma’s fast to make up for it— fast enough to outrun her enemies— if you know how to use her correctly. Signature Ability : SuperSonix She can dash through enemies and projectiles without taking damage (basically she evades attack when dashing) BUT it has a 3 second cooldown. she will also damage anything within the radius of her dash.` Basically with this you can go behind enemies and attack them from behind. Each upgrade will add another benefit to her damage Extended Ability : Adrenaline Junkie For each enemy killed within 3 seconds of each other, gain +1 stack of Epinephrine . Each stack of Epinephrine grants +5% ATK spd and MOV spd. For each 1.5 second with no damage dealt, loose a stack of Epinephrine . When activating SHIFT, consume all stacks of Epinephrine to release a shockwave which knocks enemies back. Base : Fists Bare bones fist attacks! She has two quick jabs, then a final upswing, which she can then use to attack them again or use an item. The upswing will gain some magic damage on occasion. there is a way to anim cancel the third attack to get - 2 jab - Supersonix (get behind the enemy) - full 3-hit combo - Gun attack Which will result in launching the enemy quite far. Shift : Gunning When pressing SHIFT, Gamma can consume some MP to shoot bullets in the direction of wherever the mouse is. She can shoot quite a bit of bullets before she runs out of MP (And it regenerates over time, anyway). However, their range is limited and she remains stationary during this time. ULTIMATE : SLAUGHTERHOUSE Goes off of HP. Your health decreases by 1% + base ATK*.25 / 100` Time stops, leaving behind a neon trail so it gets hard to see after a while. When finished, she takes a little burst of damage. For each enemy killed, she gains +1% health. This number increases if she kills a lot in a combo (ie 10 enemies -> 2%…). If she dies in this state, Gamma will explode! Will instantly kill any enemy below 60% health and below miniboss status (bosses get cut down to 250% of her ATK). Gallery poor video example ![[RPReplay_Final1730756765.mp4]] “Patch notes” Old ability: - Gamma has a small chance on hit to gain thorns on hit (the chance increases depending on how powerful the incoming attack is), which reflects 100% of damage, but only lasts for 1 hit suffered. He takes 50% reduced damage from it. Stackable and upgradable (chance up to receive it) Passive 25% extra damage with projectiles.
docs.title: Gamma

docs.text: Gamma’s this sorta hyperactive, one extreme to the next, all or nothing sort of thinker. Not so insane as everyone else, surprisingly, and has the most amount of compassion for other people than anyone else. On the outside, like at work, she’s this crazy trigger happy mercenary who kills as she pleases. She completely disregards her own health and defenses, which make a lot of people think she is suicidal. She takes great joy in innards in general, but she’s at least very good at her job. But surprisingly, she’d do anything for her friends. She’s quite gullible and brash and loves like a dog— complete and unconditional love. She’s extremely quickly paced and switches very drastically between her emotions, but still prioritizes everyone else above herself. I’m sure you know where this goes. This actually stresses her out greatly and she has essentially trained herself to enjoy the pain which is how she gets out her stress— gore. Gore gore and more gore. Gamma will fight until the day she dies. In fact, that’s how she hopes to go out. As an explosion, rather than a long drawn-out flame.
docs.title: Personality

docs.text: Gamma was born into a 16-year-old-female-titanium skeleton within generation 3 ( even though Honeycakes remains to be ~10 years older than her), and is the second youngest clone in that generation outside of Epsilon . She was born prematurely, but is still quite healthy. She never particularly stood out when fighting for Pyrrhon, except until when she’d left FUTURE. Everyone else kind of ignored the newer g3 clones, and many (like Phi , Chi , and Muse ) didn’t even know that they existed. Because of her general.. being-ignored-thing, she was paired up with another Low-level clone— a cranky old gen-2, half-working piece of scrap metal named Prodigal . Over Gamma’s lifetime (from years 8-17) she grew extremely close to Prodigal , almost to the point of an obsession. Prodigal could have quite honestly cared less. Anyway, one day, Prodigal came up with a full map of FUTURE which had been dropped off of an abandoned hard-drive while she was dumpster diving. They began hatching a plan, a plan no one had thought of before: to get out of FUTURE once and for all. From 6 months of planning came the great escape from FUTURE. Their life, right in their hands, so close— As Gamma clung onto the hatch at the ceiling, Prodigal so close— BAM!! Gamma made it out alive. Prodigal did not. The last thing Gamma saw was the eyes of Pyrrhon, and nothing else, as she crashed into Earth’s surface. For some odd reason, Gamma couldn’t remember Prodigal’s face when she landed. Nor Prodigal as a concept. Where was she? Gamma was saved by Constantine , a lone compsci nerd with nothing else to do but cut himself and weep. From that, she built her career of independent hitman work and bodyguarding and whatnot. There’s something still that itches her though, and it’s the strange, black, gooey figure who appears in the corner of her vision sometimes.
docs.title: Backstory

docs.text: Nea "" Constantine and Gamma
docs.title: Relationship with...

docs.text: Mercenary History Gamma’s a merc , or a mercenary, who does paid work. Despite only being on Earth for such a short period of time, she’s made quite the name for herself! But how..?! Gamma actually got her ‘big break’ by being scammed. Soon after she left Constantine’s town, she went a bit money crazy and blew her money on dumb shit. just Kidding she wanted cybernetic implants— or at least, ones that wouldn’t identify her as a clone so easily. She found one for an exceedingly good deal— a new charging port, which was almost seamless in her body. You could barely even tell it was there! It barely needed to be oiled and everything! And she didnt sleep on her side, so it’s perfect! narrator: it was not perfect Gamma soon found herself in a tub of ice, completely naked, with her clothes torn up and weapons gone. She’d been kidnapped! They weren’t going to give her Cyberwear, they were going to take hers! Gamma doesn’t remember much of the incident, or at least that’s what she says. But Rita does. The first thing that Rita saw was a blood and gut covered ceiling, with weapons and scalpels turned everywhere, and a suspiciously naked little girl in the middle of it. She’d killed all of the scavengers— and lived to tell the tale. admittedly, Rita’s first thought was not ‘is she okay’ but ‘wow i shoudl hire her!’. And that’s what she did. Gamma’s been working peacefully with Rita , Moanama , and the other Fixers peacefully ever since.
docs.title: Misc

docs.text: The Comet Gamma’s trusty motorcycle! Crafted of Beryllium and carbon fiber, it’s a lightweight and air-powered monster. It’s small and already barely fits Gamma, but if she really tries, she can put two people. It floats in the air via fans rather than using wheels on the ground. It’s very compact, since she needed to hide it a lot. It’s extremely fast, but it can be destroyed easily. She’s always tending to its repairs. Metallic Fists of Unknown Origin She has no idea where they came from or why she has them, but they’re her strongest (and only) means of defense. With strong electricity conducting properties and a small gun in each, it serves as a lightweight yet heavy hitting weapon.

docs.text: This note is UNFINISHED. Lives in Hà-Binh “I have nothing to lose. You, on the other hand? Everything. Now tell me what you know.” Personality “Didn’t expect much from a corpse in the first place!” Honey’s weird. I’m weird. Like many of my characters, she’s a small expansion of me. You look at Honeycakes, and she’s a bubbly and aggressive idiot. Like, really stupid. She takes jokes too seriously, or they fly over her head. She finds the stupidest, goriest things hilarious. She’s upbeat and aloof and comfortable, without a single care in the world. No social awareness, just floating around above the rest. She sees herself as an older-sister type to others. Can be serious if she really does try hard enough. Can care about people if she really wants to.. well, actually, Honeycakes cares a lot about things, like her job as well as current world politics. She’s extremely pessimistic and won’t hesitate to tear you to shreds, should you get too close. She’s aggressive to a psychotic fault, like a wild animal. Honey’s surprisingly empathetic to other clones and is usually willing to give people a second chance, even the ones that she almost kills. She doesn’t really know how to get her point across other than pure and raw violence. She doubles down and is stubborn and hard-headed. Backstory Honey doesn’t have much to her, so she says. Born in 3.0’s “humanitarian cloning program”, she was no 3 out of 9. The smaller the number, the older the body skeleton. Honey was born into the body of a 25-year-old male. He’s Omega , he’s the world’s best clone. Honey had the most of the PRODIGAL CORE inserted into him, giving him insane amounts of strength. With this, he was easily trusted and let into areas she shouldn’t be. There’s a reason why they try to dampen the intellect of clones nowadays. Honey looks around, and sees nothing but a world of everything he’s ever hated. And he’s sick of it . One small fight into a small rebellion, now he’s chained up to the wall and tortured until she can barely breathe. Three days until execution. Honey has one last look at her original form, her mother core. Two days until execution. Honey begins to ponder. One day until execution. Then, nothing at all. No one, at least in the general public, knows what happened or where she went; All they know was that 3 PiBots were torn apart and that Pyrrhon — The original war leader Pyrrhon— was injured. Pyrrhon said she wanted to be there when " Omega 's futile resistance fell", and stood right in front of Honey taunting her. But Honey broke out and injured her. The laser was fired and Omega was nowhere to be found and is presumed dead. No one had ever done that before. And Honey… She’s not Omega, she’s not a clone, and she’s not a 25-year-old-male skeleton. She’s always felt comfortable as a girl, anyway. It's so hard to function I feel like my body has died with my soul trapped inside This cold death rattle in my chest feels just like pennies in a tin can Sugar, I wonder how long you will wait for me Or if you even thought to save the pieces of my shattered ego These terrible chemical vapors are cutting up my lungs She spent two years in the mountains, meditating and dealing with various underground facilities and organizations. With Kit, Dinh, Adam, and a few others. Her skin changed color. She started to become Honey . However, due to an unfortunate argument between Python and Honeycakes, they both parted ways, mostly on Honey’s fault. It has been 5 and a half years since that day. She’s got a job and a small group of friends and no history to her whatsoever. Now, Honey lives as a fisherman and chef, staying late nights at a restaurant preparing raw meats and salads. What a shame, for who else to show up at her front door, 5 years later, but the woman she almost killed? Relationships with... Misc JUSTICE Honey’s trusty hammer! Heavy enough that almost no one can pick it up, except Honey. She picks it up with ease, one-handed, while it takes Gamma, Nea, and Constantine to even lift it up 3 inches. Coated with leather and made with beryllium, it’s painted with brass and red, despite being diamond on the inside. On each end, one fire, one electric. Two fuel tanks, made of the two chemicals in bombdeber (?? ) beetles, so it can activate almost immediately. Sometimes she burns herself, so she has leather gloves. It’s personalized with small star stickers and cute ribbons. It has spikes on the rims. There’s not much to Justice, other that Honey stole it from an old man, found dead in his home. She paid her respects and everything, but that hammer was pretty sick. Wonder who that guy was.. Beryllium has a very high heat capacity, so it can catch fire for a long time. She's good at preparing raw meat but ASS at cooking, so she's mostly hired to do preparations at the restaurant. She’s a great swimmer! She loves fish and she loves to eat them. She’ll prepare any meal for you! She likes dressing up fancy and she is really fucking hot in makeup, idfk why she's insanely good at it despite never attending a formal event. She exclusively eats meat, and nothing else. Which is funny, because her girlfriend is strictly vegetarian. Her favorite is raw fish. She likes pine trees and drinking sap. Her favorite holiday is St. Patrick's for no real reason, other than she thinks that the entire concept of “leprechauns” and “Irish people” is the most amusing thing in the world. Her favorite fruit is Jujube and she enjoys banana flavored snacks. She really hates Christmas. Really, really hates Christmas— almost as much as she hates insects! Did I mention she has a deathly fear of insects? Honey really likes classical music and really hates techno of any kind. She likes jazz and can play trombone. I like to imagine that some independent fishers go out paddle boarding to save on power and electricity. Also because they cant afford boats. Honey does this with a lot of her days, but a lot of the fishing areas are mostly filled with oil.. luckily for her, that means the fish float near the surface so she’s able to stab them. Shes a great paddler, she just doesnt like water bc she weighs like 2 tons (kidding). I also like to headcanon that honey is so heavy, that when she sits down on a chair, she doesnt actually sit down or she’d break it. She does an electric chair squat instead. me and Chasmus’ creator don’t talk anymore. So I’m looking to replace Chasmus.. Honey and Chasmus - Honey works alone in the CORE equivalent of Baguio (I HEART BAGUIO!!!!!!). She works with a street chef. She goes out to get materials because of her unmatched strength. She brings back fish and works in the farms (steals from the farms) and cuts and prepares them for less than minimum wage. She’s kind of miserable,, her boss treats her badly,,, but also, she’s a clone and clones have extremely bad reputation in that area. Due to construction and lack of funding she can’t get out, so she’s stuck there. Chasmus goes to her stand to buy some materials. Honey feels bad because Chasmus is like, 300 php off so she gives her a small piece of candy for free. Her boss did NOT like that!!!!!!!!!!!!! THEY ARE IN CRIPPLING FINANCIAL DEBT AND CANT AFFORD THAT!! Honey gets the equivalent of like, public execution with her boss :sob:. The nearby people notice that her muscles and fat are artificial and she just kinda, slumps and hides and continues to skin the fish she just got. - It begins to rain. The train goes down because of it, so she can’t get into her apartment. - “Is this the life I fought to live…?” - This starts her motivation to make sure other people don’t live like she has. - Chasmus is walking to her restaurant, and she spots Honey sitting there. She offers her an umbrella and Honey just stares at her. - “… That was really good sisig,” says Chasmus. “Even if you mostly sell fish.” - Honey is flushed and looks to the side. - “Why do you let him treat you like that?” - “I don’t have a chioce. There’s no where else to go. | I’m a clone. You know that. Why do you continue to speak to me?” - “…” - Chasmus turns to a nearby vendor who’s walking by, selling Taho. She orders two of them and hands one to Honey. - “Repayment,” says Chasmus. “I got paid earlier.” - Honey takes the Taho without a word, but doesn’t eat it. - Shitty beta I made in 2 seconds You know,” says Chasmus. “My place, uh.. I think you’d go well there.” - “Even if my body is 90% metal?” - “What does that matter? | You paid for my meal. You were beaten for it. It’s the least I could do.” - “‘S not yer fault,, what’s the point of gettin’ mad over that?” - “I mean.. if anything, you’ve changed my view on, uh, cloning, and.. we need new recipes there, anyway.” - “Your business will go down if you have me there, I—.. I can’t do that to you, y’ know? | Yer too nice, you don’t deserve that.” - “I’m offering you a job .” - “He’ll kill me.” - “We have protection.” - “…” - “…” - Chasmus takes off her scarf and wraps it around Honey’s wounds. - “You’re okay,” says Chasmus. “I’ll help you.” - “Why?” - “Think of it as repayment,” says Chasmus. - tl;dr - Chasmus feels bad for her and is like, “you were kinda good at what u do I see ya workin so I think you shoudl get a job, also you shouldn’t let him do that to you” and honey says “but I’m 90% metal” and Chasmus says “stfu” - So honey is like, eternally grateful ;; the general restaurant is alright, pretty below average but tightly knit. She’s been working there for like, four years? Gameplay Signature Ability : Aloof Honeycakes takes no hit reactions from attacks that deal less than 10% of her MAX HP. while in SHIFT, this will increase to 20%. Additionally, Honeycakes can just ignore gravity and decide to either fall faster or slower (depends on whether W/S or up arrow/down arrow is pressed while she is falling. ) Extended Ability: Heavyweight Landing on enemies from above deals bonus damage + armor break. Gain additional +50% damage if done while in SHIFT. Enemies afflicted will gain +STUN for 3 seconds. While an enemy is stunned, gain +3% HP per second of the stun. (MAX 75%). This attack stacks for each stunned enemy. Role : Heavyweight Tank You know the type. Heavy-hitting but hideously slow. That’s Honeycakes. Not much else to say! Base : BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA Honeycakes wields her nasty, nasty hammer to swing at enemies. Nothing’s too heavy for Honeycakes, but it still remains at an astounding 1 ton (joke). She swings quickly (for her standards) twice, then lands a third heavy hit which can launch the opponent. While in SHIFT, deal an additional fourth hit. She doesn’t react to ANY hits while doing her third hit. Shift : Locked in. Reflect 50% of all physical damage taken (does not count for projectile or magic attacks) gain +2 stacks of ARMOR (armor reduction +20%), and gain +1 for each 5 seconds spent in SHIFT (max: 5). When Honeycakes leaves SHIFT, all armor stacks are converted into +5% HP. HOWEVER, for each heat stack applied, remove 3% of that buff. Honeycake’s fourth attack will release a shockwave which knocks enemies back and inflicts stun for .5 seconds. If there are more than 4 enemies hit by the shockwave, STUN duration increases by +2 seconds. Does not work on bosses. “Patch notes” Hard-Headed • Upon activation, Honey suffers 25% dmg of all hits taken for the next 3 seconds or so, then launches it all back into one beam attack. However, this stuns her for a period of time and she takes 25% damage of max HP on recoil (set) • Passive: • +25% crit rate or knockback damage.
